Solution:
Exchange & Returns is defined in property file. 
The whole section:
Heading - Exchange & Returns
Body: You can return items within 14 days from the purchase date

to be structured in html in a content asset.
Description:
Please, can you change the text in “order detail page” for the return : 

!image-20240530-121759.png|width=512,height=307,alt="image-20240530-121759.png"!



*US, UK, and EN for EU :* 

* Title "Returns"
* text : "You can return items within {0} days from the date of delivery.



*FR for EU :*  

* title : “Retours”
* text : Vous pouvez retourner vos articles par voie postale, ou en boutique, dans un délai de {0} jours à compter de la réception de votre commande.


If it’s possible, we would like to have the hand on it. Because we can change the delay, when we have the big period.

thanks
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hi,

I tested on STG and a new content asset with ID {{MY-ACCOUNT-ORDER-DETAILS-RETURNS-SECTION}} has been created. Please keep the HTML structure the same and change *ONLY* the text inside of the elements to prevent regressions.

Content asset: 

!image-20240612-103800.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-103800.png"!

FR EU site:

!image-20240612-103738.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-103738.png"!

EN EU site:

!image-20240612-104208.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-104208.png"!

UK site: 

!image-20240612-104557.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-104557.png"!

US site:

!image-20240612-104818.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-104818.png"!

Do not forget to change this asset if no return is available for the country: ID {{MY-ACCOUNT-ORDER-DETAILS-NO-RETURNS}} to keep the logic similar for both cases for orders with and without returns.

!image-20240612-110112.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-110112.png"!

!image-20240612-110121.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240612-110121.png"!

Thanks,
Gergana

Description:
I don't know if this is normal, but the EUROPE site, which is in English, is linked to the “English” locale, not “english(France)”. Is this normal?
I noticed it on the content asset “PDP-shipping-return”.
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

I recommend to update English locale for any changes related to the European English site. In future if you want to roll out a new site in English, it will inherit the content from English locale. 

Also, yes it’s English locale which is used for European English website.

Moreover, the English locale for content purposes could be used for both - UK and EU English

Hello,
As you can see in the attachment on Page designer and in staging when I put banners in the “big banner” component the visuals zoom in enormously and the rendering is not at all the same as the visuals I worked on in photoshop and the rendering I want.

The solution would be to remove this zoom to keep the normal size of the banner created.

Thanks
Marion
Creator: Marion Colleaux
Comment:
[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] are you sure to change this because it is additional work to review the logic of the component.;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ,

We've never asked for a zoom in the slider.
For us, it’s a bug
Thanks

cc [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] We don’t got your point and we don’t know what you are expecting from us to do for this banner.

We have reviewed and redone some tests with the Page Designer component setting and it means the business requirement validated here : [https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4329931877/3.8+-+Homepage+FSD|https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4329931877/3.8+-+Homepage+FSD|smart-link] 

Could you clarify ?;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ,

I don't know how to explain it better but I'll try and you let me know if it's any clearer.
I think the problem is responsive.
On a large screen, the slider image zooms in on itself enormously, which risks cutting off the models' heads in the photos if we don't have enough material at the top of the visual.
Attachment 1: the image set in Cloudinary at the right size.
Attachment 2: the image integrated into sfcc, online.
Can you see the difference between the two visual renderings of the two attachments? You can see that the problem is all over the sliders. The heads are cut off everywhere because the visuals resize themselves in sfcc.



!1.jpg|width=1920,height=842,alt="1.jpg"!



!2.png|width=2545,height=1014,alt="2.png"!;hello, is it clearer?;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] , since you can't have 3 CTAs in one slider, I'm trying to create 3 different sliders for sales. Unfortunately, the zoomed rendering is extremely problematic again here.
As you can see in the attachment, the rendering of my image, with the head completely cut off.
And the image I put in Cloudinary.
On mobile, there's no problem with zooming.
Is it possible to fix this zoom problem that we didn't ask for in the first place, so that we can have nice sliders for the sales?

thank you,

my image : 

!SLIDER_DSKFEMME_1920x842.jpg|width=1920,height=842,alt="SLIDER_DSKFEMME_1920x842.jpg"!

image integrated into sfcc : 

!Capture d’écran 2024-06-12 à 12.17.37.png|width=2541,height=1168,alt="Capture d’écran 2024-06-12 à 12.17.37.png"!



cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;Do you have any news about this bug? [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] , [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:60f91d9d2b56cc0069832a09] ?;PLP on big banner too.. for sale

Sale sliders too

the idea would simply be for everything to be like the image with url component (which doesn't zoom into the image) but to keep the width 100% as it is now

!image.png|width=1337,height=656,alt="image.png"!;Hi [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330],

The issue here is that the images are capped at 715px maximum height but they keep 100% of their width, that's why you see only the middle 715px of the image and it looks like it’s zoomed. If we are to uncap them (make their height to be 100% of image), they become too big. I will make couple of screenshots with the edit and will wait for confirmation if you’d like to keep these changes or not. The example is at 50% zoom out.

Description:
Hello,
when we use a 3-column or 2-column component on desktop, when we switch to mobile, it makes huge spaces that are impossible to remove. That's no good. Is it possible to hide the empty columns, please?
Thanks
Marion

cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62]
Creator: Marion Colleaux
Comment:
[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] could you precise what you are talking about ? Which pages are you referring to ? Blogs? 

Could you precise and add more screen in order us to help ?

FYI [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] ;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] , I'm referring to any page on “Page designer”. I'm talking about the columns component (2, 3, 4 columns). On my screen, you can see the rendering of the mobile version of a column.

We often use the 3-column component, for example, to center an element in the middle column on desktop. But in the mobile version, column number 1 and column number 3 are empty but visible (i.e. they leave margins at the top of column number 2 and at the bottom). 

The solution would be to leave the height of the empty columns unchanged, so as not to leave large margins on the mobile version.

Is that clearer for you?
You tell me! 

Thank you,
Marion



!DESKTOP COLUMNS.png|width=2560,height=1043,alt="DESKTOP COLUMNS.png"!



!MOBILE COLUMNS.png|width=2559,height=1299,alt="MOBILE COLUMNS.png"!;Hello [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] and [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] 
I can see that when you try to Preview this page the space is decreased even more by default and it does not look that big. Aside from that we can not remove columns for a specific device that does not have content in them. Thanks!;okay, thank you !

Marion

* “Votre favicon doit être un multiple d'un carré de 48 pixels, par exemple : 48 x 48 pixels, 96 x 96 pixels, 144 x 144 pixels, etc. (ou un fichier SVG au format 1:1 (carré)). Tout [format de favicon valide|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Favicon#Image_file_format_support] est accepté.”

Merci d’avance,

Clément

cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] to fix it you need

1/ First thing
This is specific for the google search.
We need multiple sizes which are exactly squared, with recommandation of svg format to update the logo. You can add on this ticket the svg images in order us to load them in the right format.

2/ Second thing, there is a cache which may be blocking the update. 
-> The cache issue can happened, but if once the svg format are loaded, you need to contact Google to re-craw the website.

So the approach to fix that issue now is to :
1/ Add multiple sizes 
2/ Add svg 

We wait for these files from you and will load them, then it should solve it.;Hello voici !



!favicon48x48 (ea63bee5-fb5c-44b6-95bd-255197985222).svg|alt="favicon48x48.svg"!;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] we need also 96 x 96 pixels, 144 x 144 pixels etc in svg

Could you provide us and update the Jira status once done ?

FYI [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] voici



!favicon48x48 (1c7b7767-a266-48bd-aac1-14d054555fb8).svg|alt="favicon48x48.svg"!

!favicon144x144.svg|alt="favicon144x144.svg"!;There is a code changes. [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] Could you please merge it?;[~accountid:61d59a76125b120071eca888] could you check this ticket ?;{quote}Google looks for and updates your favicon whenever it crawls your home page. If you make changes to your favicon and want to inform Google about the changes, you can [request indexing|https://developers.google.com/search/docs/crawling-indexing/ask-google-to-recrawl] of your site's home page. Updates can take a few days or longer to appear in search results.

{quote}

Hi [~accountid:60f91d9d2b56cc0069832a09] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] 

As per google docs after change of the favicon (which we did) we need to request indexing or wait a few day or longer to appear in the google search result.

We don't have control over google crawlers and when they run so this is expected to be not updated on a same day!


Regards,

D;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] in order to fix this ticket you need to ask Google to reindex the UK and US site in order the meta we have loaded are appearing online.

You can follow this process to ensure Google updates its index with your new logo, you can request indexing of the page where you've added the structured data:

* Go to Google Search Console.
* Select your website property.
* Use the URL Inspection tool to fetch the page with the new logo markup.
* Click on "Request Indexing" to prompt Google to crawl the page.;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ,

Description:
Hello,

Concerning Einstein recommendations, we would like to know two things:

* We would like to make sure that for each of our websites, Einstein is now active and collecting data.
* Is it possible to use these recommendation blocks right now? We agreed that even if the analysis wasn't complete and 100% consistent, we could use these blocks.

Because today we don't have any automatic blocks.

cc [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hi [~accountid:6139d3f27eb35f006943db78] and [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] 

Could you please have a look to this ticket please? 

Thanks 🙂 ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] you can find here the specification related to where we target to use Einstein and the related recommender types.

[https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4329936120/Einstein|https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4329936120/Einstein|smart-link] 

Please let us know where you want us to activate it on production environment : 

* USA site 
* UK site
* EU site

Thanks for your reply and the action expected from us to cover this requirement.

Is it possible to do the french manuscript in the french page too please ?;Hello, [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] 

To update the image for the French locale, from Page Designer:

# Select the locale French (France)

!image-20240606-104714.png|width=499,height=393,alt="image-20240606-104714.png"!

# Select the component:

!image-20240606-104841.png|width=742,height=613,alt="image-20240606-104841.png"!

# From the component settings, change the localization to Localize

!image-20240606-104951.png|width=654,height=520,alt="image-20240606-104951.png"!

# The “Fallback“ icon will disappear and then you can change the image. The change will be applied ONLY to the French Locale

!image-20240606-105123.png|width=1366,height=536,alt="image-20240606-105123.png"!

 ;it’s perfect, thank you so much [~accountid:712020:3a759d56-f9c7-477d-9ede-cab93a17cf42] it works!

Description:

1 EU

Automatic replication is scheduled everyday 6 am.



!image-20240602-132614.png|width=1899,height=395,alt="image-20240602-132614.png"!

Only 1 is enough because product data is shared between all sites.

Best,

Description:
[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ,

Following the concerns of migrated customers who don't have a telephone number.
We'd like to add a telephone number field to the shipping address form.
This field must be mandatory for the purchasing process.

We already have this field in the address form in the address book. We want the same design/location: 

!image-20240528-165820.png|width=66.66666666666666%,alt="image-20240528-165820.png"!

Concerning the telephone data in “my account”, here's the rule we'd like to have when placing an order:

* IF the customer doesn't have a phone number in their account, THEN I retrieve the phone number from the shipping address, and ADD it to their account.
* IF the phone number exists in my account, then I DO NOT update the number.

Thank you in advance for your help,

cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] [~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] in case the phone number is already existing on the account you confirm that the phone number on the shipping address should be automatically populated with the account phone number but the customer can update it in case it is a different phone number for the delivery and this phone number is a mandatory field in the checkout, right ?

FYI [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] ;*General Overview*
Let define terms:
new phone number - delivery / shipping phone field
old phone number - my account phone number

Add a new phone number field on shipping/delivery form. The reason behind this change is related to the migrated customers which does not have a phone number (or it’s a 0) and the desire of Agnes b. to not block customers on the checkout. The new phone field should be based on the “old” phone number in the way described in *Flows*.


+*Flows:*+

Customer with Existing account (*NOT* migrated account)

# If the customer has already a phone number in my account section (the customer has an address saved to their profile) then the initial value of the new phone field should be equal to the old phone number.
# If the customer attempts to update the new phone field of the Delivery/Shipping page, the old phone number in my account should be updated.
# The information sent to the OMS should be always the updated phone number.

Customer with Migrated account

# If the customer has a migrated account then the phone number in my account will be 0. If the customer goes to the my account then he will be able to update his profile and in the checkout the scenario “Customer with Existing Account” will be applied.
# If the customer does not update his phone in my account and lands directly to the checkout, then the new shipping field will be empty and it will be mandatory to be added.
# When the new phone field is updated it should update the my account phone and to be sent to the OMS once the customer places an order.



+*Technical Approach*+

For the above Flows, I don’t see any reason to have 2 different phone number fields. A single custom attribute in my account (+which is used currently+) could be used as a standalone source of truth which could be updated from my account, delivery/shipping form and edit on billing form. 

To achieve the above requirements, a new form field should be created and aligned with the validation of the shipping form. The phone field should be a replica of the my account phone field. Once the Shipping form is submitted, the new phone field should update the custom attribute in my account for the phone. This way, it’s no longer necessary to change the checkout flow afterwards => OMS request should not be changed because with this approach we already guarantee that the custom attribute which is used for the OMS data is already updated with the new phone field.;Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

Please check my last comment and validate the *Flows*. If this is the desired behavior of the phone field.;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] To initiate the development we just want you to validate what we have described;Hello to you both,

And thank you [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67]  for your proposal.

I’m not agree with this point : 

{quote}1. 2 If the customer attempts to update the new phone field of the Delivery/Shipping page, the old phone number in my account should be updated.{quote}

AND : 

{quote}# 3. When the new phone field is updated it should update the my account phone and to be sent to the OMS once the customer places an order.{quote}


For my part, I've made a proposal for customers who already have the phone number in “my account” : 

{quote}* IF the phone number exists in my account, then I DO NOT update the number.{quote}

I'll tell you why: 

We have VIP customers, with phone numbers in their accounts, to whom we send messages regularly.
If this VIP customer wants to buy a product and send it to another contact, and changes the contact’s phone number.
We don't want our VIP customer to have someone else's number. Do you understand?

So, I don't know if it's technically possible, but here's how we see it with [~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] :

*Scenario 1*: The customer already has a number in his account.

When he goes to checkout, the number is automatically retrieved from the shipping address. {color:#36b37e}OK WITH YOUR PROPOSAL{color}

*Scenario 2*: The customer has no number in his account. 

When he goes to checkout, the number in the shipping address is sent to my account because it is empty. {color:#36b37e}OK WITH YOUR PROPOSAL{color}

*Scenario 3*: The customer already has a number in his account. 

When he goes to checkout, and CHANGES his number in the shipping address, we DO NOT touch the number in my account. {color:#bf2600}DIFFERENT WITH YOUR PROPOSAL{color}

How easy is this for you?

thanks,

[~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] your return is clear for me we will start to work on it from tomorrow and we let you know about the time needed to complete.;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0]  ,
*DHL:* only if the telephone number is empty we have a service error: #\/customerDetails\/receiverDetails\/contactInformation\/phone expected type String found Null
*Chronopost/Colissimo:* from what I have debugged for the moment even empty/bad phone number the label is generated.
*UPS :* at least 10 digit characters;Hello [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] ,

I see your feedback by email, my answer is : don’t need to save the number shipping.

“3) If the answer from above point 2) is: my account then we don’t need to save the shipping phone number anywhere and we can assume that in the shipping form the default phone will be always from my account and basically the shipping phone number would be just a temporary phone for the current delivery.”

thanks;Hello,

I tested on STG and I have covered different cases: 

* the Phone number field is added to the shipping address form
* IF the phone number exists in my account - the phone number is prefiled in the shipping address: 

!image-20240607-135531.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240607-135531.png"!

* The phone number field is updated correctly on the Order confirmation page, Invoice, receipt, Order history, Return page, in the OMS - shipping address of the order

!image-20240607-135854.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240607-135854.png"!

When the customer is migrated without telephone number, then the phone number is retrieved from the shipping address, and ADD it to their account. It is also updated in the OMS customer profile. 

When the order is placed with C&C or pick up point the phone number is retrieved from my account.

The phone number is at least 10 digit characters only for the UPS (US site).

Тhere is one small issue for the EU site-on the checkout-create an account- the phone number label is broken, but it will be fixed as soon as possible: 

!image-20240607-142129.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240607-142129.png"!



Thanks,
Gergana;[~accountid:60f91d9d2b56cc0069832a09] , hello, i confirm it’s ok !

thanks for production 🙂

Description:
In our contract, we put forward the idea of limiting campaigns to regions: 

“11.4 Show up upcoming boutique events / La fab expositions… Be able to sort it by region on the home page. If there is no events, this block will not appear from the front office”

Is this possible?
Thanks in advance,

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] I don’t get your point here. You would like to administrate on Page Designer some activities related to events right ? Could you provide me more details ? You want this content to be manageable by regions, is it the need?;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ,

No, rather by geolocation.
Today, we can limit a campaign or content to a specific customer list, but can we do it to a city?
For example, if I have an event in Marseille, can I limit the content if the connected user is in the PACA region?
It seems to me that Salesforce offers this option.

Otherwise, we have to create customer lists, and adapt the content to these lists. This is personalization .


Thank you,;Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

You can create a dynamic customer group where the customer will be automatically added if the criteria is matched.

You can use customer group geolocation data:

!image-20240808-095132.png|width=545,height=387,alt="image-20240808-095132.png"!



I will give you an example from my City response from the geolocation:


!image-20240808-095221.png|width=592,height=289,alt="image-20240808-095221.png"!



For the PACA Region, you need to use regionCode and regionName as a rule in the dynamic customer group.

Next step is to link this customer group to a campaign. (I think you are familiar how to do it)

Next step is to add customer group to the page designer page:


!image-20240808-095412.png|width=1643,height=847,alt="image-20240808-095412.png"!; [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] [~accountid:631b58598473817d7d0698eb] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

Pour information, nous pouvons faire des affichages dynamiques en fonction de la localisation, nous devons tester.

Merci!;Hi,

just a note:

Name of the regions is based on this:
[https://www.maxmind.com/en/locate-my-ip-address|https://www.maxmind.com/en/locate-my-ip-address|smart-link] 

Salesforce referred to the above website in their documentation.

Hello,
I have fixed the issues.

Summary: Search library to modify images in the menu (FR)
Solution:
To meet this requirement, the process is to create a content asset after having loaded your images into the library (for Desktop and mobile format). 1- Load image on the library 2-Create a new content asset following this one as example : images/menu/b.commited_1_m.png 3-In the content asset body, copy/paste these in the body

Made in France

4-update into that body the image's links that you have added in to the library
Description:
Hello, I'm looking for the library to modify the images in the menu (FR). The current images are not in the “webdav” library. Where do I put my new images and then replace them in the menu, please?

Thank you for your help,
Marion

Summary: US customers migrated without phone number or phone number defined as 0
Description:
As a customer, in case I had an account on the Agnèsb previous website, when I am connected to the new [agnesb.com|http://agnesb.com] site, if my phone number on my customer account is 0 or not defined, I should update it in order to be able to proceed to checkout.

This phone number should be a 10 characters format and meet the expected format requested by the UPS webservice.

In case the customer phone number doesn’t meet the format expected by the carrier’s involved on the billing country, we should have a default phone number to unblock the delivery label (customer service phone number instead in that case, that can be updated in the Salesforce backoffice depending on the carrier and the delivery country related).



*Acceptance criteria*

* Log in to the US site with your existing email address without having any phone number linked to your account
* Add products to cart
* Try to proceed to checkout
* You are blocked and you need to update on your account details fields the phone number related to your account
* Once the phone number is updated and saved you can proceed to check out, proceed to payment and once the payment succeeded, you are redirected to the order confirmation page. After that you receive the order confirmation email and can consult your recent order on My Order into my account dashboard online.
Creator: Sarah Margoses

Thanks,

cc [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]  [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] 

I did a correction on the first product → Made it online in SFCC.

Online Flag is not transferred from Akeneo to SFCC, because there are multiple conditions product to be online in Akeneo which cannot be managed by the connector.

If you create a new product in Akeneo and has 100% Completeness in Akeneo, by default it will be online in SFCC once it’s transferred. But later on, if you want to make it offline, you have few possibilities: to do in SFCC or to make it Out of stock in OCI. 

Do you think you can manage it that way?

[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;Hi [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] 

Here another example. Just for info, yesterday I cleaned the product that were published or not and the cardigan may have been part of the process. 

Here another exemple. 

It’s published on Agnès B. US:

!image-20240522-074756.png|width=1872,height=164,alt="image-20240522-074756.png"!

Stocks from our side:

!image-20240522-074610.png|width=888,height=173,alt="image-20240522-074610.png"!



It’s not online: 

!image-20240522-074837.png|width=50%,alt="image-20240522-074837.png"!



I don’t understand why these products are all OK from Akeneo and SFCC, but still not online. Is it normal? 

Have a great day

Chiara;Hi [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] 

No no we did not give our go for if a product is complete on Akeneo it has to be published on SFCC. We never gave our OK for this!

A product if complete on Akeneo, it has to be sent on SFCC but not published. 

We decide, like we talked about, if a product is online or not but completing “online flag” to YES for the specific product. 

From the begin the publication info should have come from Akeneo, sadly you couldn’t do the mapping and the info had to come from SFCC.  Therefor we decide on SFCC if a product has to be published or not. 

The default info has to be ‘NO’ and then we decide when we want to publish a product

Thanks

Request : *Free Shipping over $250*



!image-20240516-170149.png|width=908,height=541,alt="image-20240516-170149.png"!

Creator: Bintou MARIKO
Comment:
Hello,
[~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62]

Just looked into it and for this you should change the *ID* of the promotion or add a name for it. It takes the *Name* attribute first, and if there is no *Name,* then it takes the *ID*. Still it would be best to add and in the future change *Name*, instead of changing the *ID.* I can change it on staging but not on production. 

Kamen.

* [https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/women/accessories/masks/|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/women/accessories/masks/]

The redirection plan has been adjusted accordingly.;[~accountid:712020:9938fca8-2f04-4c88-96a0-038cabdac283] Can you check everything again since I had to delete everything and create again the Redirects without the ones that were creating issues.

[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

La robe a été rejetée lors de la préparation de commande, c’est pourquoi l’article est annulé.

Dans ce cas, il faudrait plutôt envoyer un seul email d’annulation de commande ?;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0]

J’en ai profité pour corriger aussi en cas de modification depuis OMS;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] Alors j’ai du me tromper, j'étais sur de l’avoir fait depuis l’app.. ;Hello [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] , on parle d’une commande qui a été créée le 10 avril et traitée le 15 mai là…

Merci

Comment:
[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] for some content assets and content slots, you can use the storefront toolkit to find what content asset is used. You can access it by going to BM and clicking this button:

!image-20240514-090809.png|width=798,height=334,alt="image-20240514-090809.png"!

Then in the tab that opens you can click this button to show content info:

!image-20240514-090849.png|width=1396,height=378,alt="image-20240514-090849.png"!

Then you can hover over some content on the page, you can see a link to the content in BM:

!image-20240514-091037.png|width=1498,height=528,alt="image-20240514-091037.png"!

This works only if the developer remembered to add the content ID in the code, so it might not work for all content.

The other way is to export the whole SharedLibrary from BM and just look for the text in the xml.

In this case when you click the link it takes you to a slot configuration, which uses 3 content assets - so you need to find the {{My-Account-branding-3}} content asset and edit it

!image-20240514-091442.png|width=1150,height=266,alt="image-20240514-091442.png"!



!image-20240514-091447.png|width=820,height=181,alt="image-20240514-091447.png"!;Thank you !!

Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] , it’s regression or because you merge something? ;Hello [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] , y’a pas eu de changement de mon cote depuis 2/3 semaines sur les services transporteurs.

Pour [+US24000804+|https://agnesb.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/1OsbK000000O5hhSAC/view]: voici l’erreur *du service UPS* {"response":{"errors":[{"code":"120209","message":"Missing or invalid ship to phone number"}]}}

De ce que je peux voir on es cense envoyer la valeur FulfillmentOrder.FulfilledToPhone mais ce champ est vide sur le record.


[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] , [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] , voici une nouvelle commande bloquée de la même manière : US24000709

[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0]  me remonte que c’est un prblème salesforce.

Merci pour vos retours

Clément;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Hello,  j’ai débuguer ce cas la également je recois une erreur du service UPS: _{"response":{"errors":[{"code":"120209","message":"Missing or invalid ship to phone number"}]}}._
Le champ Fulfilled To Phone dans le +*Fulfillment Order*+ est vide alors qu’il es obligatoire dans notre requete vers UPS.
;[~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] ,

Le numéro de téléphone est bien présent à la base de la commande, il n’est pas transporté dans le Fulfillment, c’est un pb salesforce. C’est bien ça ?

cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Le nom transmission du n° de téléphone entre SFCC et Salesforce core est standard, ce champ non populé dans Salesforce Core ne permet pas la génération de l'étiquette par UPS car le n° de téléphone est obligatoire pour pouvoir la générer. Nous avons ouvert un Case auprès de Salesforce #467427768 et attendons leur retour.

En attendant nous pouvons procéder à des correctifs manuels pour que le champ ne soit pas vide et ne bloque pas la génération de l'étiquette qu’en penses-tu?

FYI [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] En attendant le retour de Salesforce, j’ai mis en place un automatisme qui s’assurer que le téléphone est toujours rempli.
Ce correctif temporaire est présent en recette. OK pour déployer en PROD et tester de votre côté ?;test ok : *US24001243*

GO PROD

merci [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

[~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] OK c’est déployé

Description:
Hello, 

The images on each page were created on Page designer using the “image with URL” component. 

Our images don't always point to a link, this is deliberate. 

When you move the cursor over these images without a link, it indicates that they're clickable even if we didn't put a link (on purpose). They all redirect to a 404 error page.

Is it possible not to make the images without links clickable, please? 

Thank you,
Marion

Summary: CHANGE REQUEST - Annonce de retour et adresse de taxation - ON HOLD
Description:
Pour un compte client Y2 avec une adresse en France mais avec une commande à facturer et à livrer au US, l’annonce de retour s’enregistre dans Y2 avec une adresse de facturation et de livraison en France.

Par défaut Y2, reprend l’adresse de la fiche client.

J’ai modifié un paramètre dans Y2 pour reprendre l’adresse de livraison de la boutique pour la nature de document ANR. En fonction de test à réaliser cet après-midi, nous étudierons s’il est nécessaire de rajouter les adresses de livraison et de facturation dans les appels ANR.

A date, l’impact porte sur le pays de taxation des lignes de tickets à adresser à l’ERP et à JDE.

Cela permettra de réaliser les tests pour Sabine. [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] , tu confirmes que [hannah.moise@agnesb.fr|mailto:hannah.moise@agnesb.fr] est basée en FR ?

Thanks;[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

Le compte 001Aa00000S1Rw4IAF en staging est associé à l'établissement F41 (France) tandis que le compte 001Aa00000dD6CbIAK est associé à l'établissement G41 (UK).

Aucun des 2 comptes n’est fermé.

En revanche j’ai fermé 2 autres comptes avec la même adresse mail qui n’ont pas d’id SF.

Thank you for raising this issue with us and expanding with the example.

The 3DS2 error you are experiencing can be attributed to a region miss-match in your configuration. The /payments API request is initiated with the default region (EU) while your front-end component is configured for the US region which leads to this error and the payment will not be able to be completed.

Please go to Merchant tools > Custom preferences and chose the default or EU region for your front-end resources.

Let me know if that resolves the issue.

The Amex issue has been fixed.

The issue was a configuration:
*Front-end resources region* in the SFCC Adyen Settings should be *EU* 


!image-20240514-083208.png|width=1892,height=915,alt="image-20240514-083208.png"!

because on Adyen side, Agnes b are using EU as a default region for US and EU.

!image-20240514-083346.png|width=1903,height=954,alt="image-20240514-083346.png"!

[https://|https://3902c69b5382fa3a-agnesb-checkout-live.adyenpayments.com/checkout/v70/payments][*3902c69b5382fa3a-AgnesB*|https://3902c69b5382fa3a-agnesb-checkout-live.adyenpayments.com/checkout/v70/payments][-checkout-live.adyenpayments.com/checkout/v70/payments|https://3902c69b5382fa3a-agnesb-checkout-live.adyenpayments.com/checkout/v70/payments] 
should match the prefix configured on Adyen for EU.


During the tests we observed 2 other issues:
- Order confirmation email is not received (To be checked by BBD)
- When you pay with 3DS the payment form is submitted and white pop up is displayed until the process is finished. Solution for this one should be to keep the form disabled (submitted) until all process are finished and order confirmation page is displayed. (To be done)

Agnes b team will do tests in the afternoon and will get back to BBD if everything is working as expected.

Comment:
Apart from the lookbooks, there's also the responsible materials page, where the breadcrumbs don't want to be displayed even though they're checked and OK in page designer: 

!image-20240507-125426.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240507-125426.png"!

# you are not seeing the breadcrumbsEnabled option on lookbook pages because they are of type {{categoryPage}} - these pages are supposed to be with the same structure as a PLP (product listing page), and always connected to a category, so we haven’t added the option to hide or show the breadcrumbs.
# The breadcrumbs don’t appear on the storefront, because you have enabled the option on the default locale, but on the storefront is the en-US locale - so you need to enable them for that locale. The inheritance apparently doesn’t work for settings in {{Page settings}}.

Marion;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] To summarize

# A PD page of type “Category page” will always have breadcrumbs enabled IF a category from the current site catalog is assigned. 
!image-20240513-144658.png|width=1252,height=49,alt="image-20240513-144658.png"!
# A PD page of type “Store page” has a preference in the page designer “Page settings”, where breadcrumbs can be enabled - this needs to be done for all locales on the page designer interface.

!image-20240513-145009.png|width=1060,height=608,alt="image-20240513-145009.png"!



Maybe issue in this case might be that the category assigned is not found in US site catalog - (can happen if the page was exported/imported).

Can you give me a link or the ID of the the exact PD page where you are seeing this issue? Also please double check if the category is part of the current site storefront catalog.;Hello [~accountid:712020:ebac7c57-90f8-4784-aa37-cd3463dd2d3b] , 

Thank you very much for your explanations!

Here are the 2 IDs where we encounter this problem:

* [lookbook-femme-summer-24|https://staging-eu01-agnesb.demandware.net/on/demandware.store/Sites-Site/default/ViewLdsBusinessManagerScreen-PageDesigner/#/edit/page/lookbook-femme-summer-24]
* [lookbook-men-summer|https://staging-eu01-agnesb.demandware.net/on/demandware.store/Sites-Site/default/ViewLdsBusinessManagerScreen-PageDesigner/#/edit/page/lookbook-men-summer]

Marion;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] in the page settings for both of these pages you can see that a category that is only in EU catalog is assigned:

!image-20240514-072115.png|width=654,height=296,alt="image-20240514-072115.png"!

!image-20240514-072127.png|width=654,height=298,alt="image-20240514-072127.png"!

This is why the breadcrumbs can’t be generated, because the category is not found in the current storefront catalog (Storefront_Catalog_US).

So there’s 2 ways you can fix this.

# If you want to use the same PD page on all 3 sites - create a category with the same ID on all 3 storefront catalogs and assign the PD page to this category.
# If you want to have different PD pages for each site, you just need to create a new PD page for each site and assign a category that exists in the respective storefront catalog.;Hello ,
I did the same thing for the UK site and managed to put the breadcrumbs on the 2 men's and women's Summer 24 lookbooks.
I did exactly the same thing for the US site but it still doesn't work. However, on the designer page I can see them now. But in staging they don't appear.;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] 

Can you please give me an example Page Designer page so I can have a look at the exact issue there. Thanks!

The content asset ID is {{Order-Confirmation-Page-Redirection}}. If you want to change the pages with another content page, the URL should be the following {{&url('Page-Show', 'cid', 'DesiredContentPageID')&}}. If the page is a result from an endpoint call the URL should be {{&url('Controller-Endpoint')&}}. For now I have updated the asset with the desired content.

Description:
If the site is US or UK, and the customer subscribe to the newsletter then the customer should receive the newsletter suscription email with the coupon code WELCOME.



Trigger via API the following external key welcomeGift. This should be sent either from the popin or from the us site footer or from the account creation form,
Creator: Sarah Margoses
Comment:
[~accountid:61829b48892c420072eac0f5] 

We already send to Marketing Cloud a parameter in the Data “site_origin" which tells what is the site that this email comes from. 

Is it possible to handle this functionality from Marketing Cloud side having in mind the “site_origin” or we really need this new parameter to be send as well?
 
In case we need the parameter, can you please tell me how exactly do you want us to send it and also what type should be this parameter (string, boolean), etc.

[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] [~accountid:5efe11d06fddfb0bb40896c1] ;[~accountid:712020:20f7ecd6-f40a-4986-a404-5e1b815540dd] , 

In fact this is not the right process. In Marketing cloud with triggers we can’t decide which site (UK or US site) because it’s SFCC who has the information and can trigger the emails. The right solution is to create a trigger in SFMC for each site with a different external key. So SFCC can decide based on “site_origin” the trigger that will use by API. 

Tell me if it’s okay for you so I can create two triggers : *welcomeGiftUs* and *welcomeGiftUk* 

Thanks,

Ilyass;Hello,

I tested on STG, for US, UK sites, and CA local, and the email is sent to the customers who are subscribed to the Newsletter with promo code WELCOME. I tested the subscription from the footer, Newsletter pop-up, Create an account from the Checkout and My account.

!image-20240508-090331.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240508-090331.png"!

Thanks,

Summary: UPS format - label generate by OMS and dowload by Bayretail for US ORDER
Description:
[~accountid:63bc0cde2a526608c54f66d2] As we've seen, it's imperative that we print our UPS shipping labels on thermal printers.
The basic format is ZPL.
But I see that Nathaniel has generated a GIF format.
Can you tell us whether we can generate ZPL or GIF labels from OMS and Bayretail please?
Only for the US.

Thanks for your help,

[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
When Mimi print via Bayretail, she have this : 

!image (26).png|width=100%,alt="image (26).png"!

When [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] , send me this label : 

!Label (1).gif|width=75%,alt="Label (1).gif"!

We want the same format at Nathaniel for the US.

thanks

Clément

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] , [~accountid:63bc0cde2a526608c54f66d2] , [~accountid:5b3a445fe06ca62dc8ad8e4d] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Hello, 
For information, the Label examples that I sent were generated via postman to test a point that we had discussed (the postal code with the 4 additional digits). These labels are in GIF format, but on Salesforce I generate them in PDF thanks to an additional call.;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

Pour résumer UPS fourni soit un format GIFs (imprimable depuis l’OMS mais pas depuis l’app) soit PDF (imprimable depuis l’App mais pas conforme à vos standards d’impression attendu).  

La solution est donc d’imprimer depuis l’OMS les GIFs à court terme. 

Néanmoins, si vous le souhaitez nous pouvons étudier la faisabilité d’imprimer un GIFs depuis l’App. Etant hors scope nous ne pouvons garantir la faisabilité et le temps de mise en oeuvre. 

[~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:5b3a445fe06ca62dc8ad8e4d] [~accountid:5f50e3d242959b00391f90c8] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Quelle est la décision prise par rapport à ce ticket ?;Vu avec [~accountid:63bc0cde2a526608c54f66d2] , l’équipe Bayretail doit regarder la faisabilité pour récupérer et mettre à disposition le format GIF.

[~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] , peux-tu nous confirmer que Salesforce supporte ce format ? L’OMS peut générer le GIF ?

Merci,

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] cela est faisable et prend 3j :BayRetail_Features:. J’attends votre Go 😉

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f]  ;Hello [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] , Oui un label en format GIF est bien  stocke sur OMS.
Voici un exemple d’un ancien Shipment sur Staging avec le label au format GIF.
[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Shipment/0OBAa0000000MBpOAM/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Shipment/0OBAa0000000MBpOAM/view];[~accountid:63bc0cde2a526608c54f66d2] , tu sais si c’est ok Bayretail, je peux tester? ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] l'équipe est entrain de bosser sur le sujet. Je reviens vers toi lundi. ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]  Comme discuté hier, pour répondre à ce besoin nous proposons de passer par un système tiers ([https://labelary.com/|https://labelary.com/|smart-link] ) pour générer le fichier PDF. Ce système tiers n’est donc pas maintenu par nous et donc nous ne pouvons garantir la pérennité sur le long terme. 

De plus pour valider que cela correspond à vos besoins il faudrait valider avec Mimi que cela fonctionne en condition réelle et cible c’est à dire imprimer via un PDA et unee tablette avec une imprimante Zebra connectée au wifi. Peux tu stp coordonner cela avec Mimi ? Voici le fichier. [^2b6fb399-9ad9-4468-9a4b-a07fc9164cf5] 

[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:5f50e3d242959b00391f90c8]

Description:

Le retour US24000003-R1_FO1 contient une adresse française dans un retour pour une commande US

Il s’agit d’une anomalie, l’adresse est l’adresse à laquelle le client a demandé la livraison de la commande ie aux US.

[https://agnesb.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a14bK000000ZzDVQA0/view|https://agnesb.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a14bK000000ZzDVQA0/view]

Comment:

Car côté commande/retour tout est US et dans la spec #19 on n’a aucune notion d’adresse;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] on n’envoie pas d’adresse au niveau du flux retour 19,  peut être que c’est liée au client ou a la commande initial 

cc [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] ?;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Je confirme en revanche que l’adresse du client sur la fiche du compte est bien en France;Si l’adresse n’est pas renvoyée dans l’annonce de retour, je pense qu’il s’agit d’une anomalie Y2. L’anomalie est enregistrée chez nous. Je vous tiens au courant [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

mail envoyé à Lahouari ce jour.;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] afin de faire confirmer l’anomalie, pourrais-tu m’envoyer les logs du *MA-0023* (retour) ainsi que les logs du MWA *MA-0021* afin que Cegid confirme qu’il s’agit d’une anomalie et nous donne le contournement ou la solution pour ne pas hériter par défaut de l’adresse de la fiche client. Merci.

cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;en pj le fichier ;Merci [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] le numéro de ticket CEGID est CS3688796;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Cette anomalie CEGID a-t-elle été corrigée ?

Description:
Rien dans le middleware action, payment en “authorised”, pas de capture.

cc [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Tu as mis le FO c&c dans le statut “Shipped” au lieu de “Waiting Customer Pickup”. Il y a eu d’autres bugs remontés sur le sujet et nous avons mis spécifiquement en place une règle pour ne pas traiter ce cas incohérent.;Bonjour [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] , [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] ,

J’avais bien cliqué sur “Waiting for customer pick-up” avant de valider.

Avec votre nouvelle règle, vous confirmez qu’il ne sera pas possible de reproduire ce cas?

Merci

Clément;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

Avais tu bien enregistré le FO au statut “Waiting for customer pick-up“ ?


La règle dont parle Lionel n’empêche pas de passer au statut Shipped sans passer par WaitingCustomerPickUp, mais uniquement de ne pas créer de Middleware Action en cas d’incohérence.
Nous pouvons ajouter dans le backlog un ticket pour bloquer le passage à “Fulfilled” si le statut précédent n’est pas “WaitingCustomerPickup” ou “WaitingCarrierPickup”. OK pour toi ?

[~accountid:712020:20f7ecd6-f40a-4986-a404-5e1b815540dd] ;Hello [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] 
In the example that you gave we have an issue in the rule. Here is the correct way to create this rule:


{noformat}${IF Category.pageTitle THEN Category.pageTitle ELSE Constant('Découvrez ') AND Category.displayName}{noformat}

When we create Page Meta Tag Rules we need to have in mind the following things:
1. We have to make sure that the rules we create correspond to the correct properties for the certain page
2. In the category attributes (PLP Rules) we have to make sure that the Page Title field is not empty. These fields are localisable and a specific language settings take priority over the default settings.
(example path: Merchant Tools > Products and Catalogs > Catalogs > Storefront_Catalog_US > Men > Accessories > Belts > Category Attributes)
3. We have to make sure that once we create a specific Page Meta Tag rule, after that we need to assign the specific pages for the rule to apply

The same Page Meta Tag rules apply for all pages.

cc: [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;Bonjour [~accountid:63be8bf6c52a63dcda830dd9] , 

Peux tu m’indiquer avec quel contact tu as fait ton test ? 

Les footers des NLs ont bien un lien désabonnement qui envoie vers : *%%=CloudPagesURL(19311)=%%* 

*19311* étant l’ID de la cloud page avec l’URL : [https://pub.info.agnesb.com/unsubscribev2|https://pub.info.agnesb.com/unsubscribev2] . Nous utilisons la fonction CloudPageURL afin de rediriger vers la bonne page de désinscription. 

En faisant un test sur l’email NL Welcome US, le lien est fonctionnel : 

!image-20240611-114338.png|width=75%,alt="image-20240611-114338.png"!

Le contact utilisé pour ce test : *0031n00002K8tRwAAJ* 

Quand je fais un test avec un contact qui a comme ID son adresse email (exemple: [iaitmoussa@baybridgedigital.com|mailto:iaitmoussa@baybridgedigital.com]), le lien redirige directement vers la page d’erreur : 



!image-20240611-114627.png|width=75%,alt="image-20240611-114627.png"!

En effet, dans le code de la cloud page de désabonnement [https://pub.info.agnesb.com/unsubscribev2|https://pub.info.agnesb.com/unsubscribev2] on a un filtre sur les contact IDs qui viennent du CRM (Salesforce) : 

{noformat}set @longid = _subscriberkey
set @checkId = Substring(@longid,1,3)
/* on vérifie que c'est bien un Id d'un objet Contact SF */
If @checkId == "003" THEN 
  Set @BU= '7298397'
  SET @jid = JobID
  SET @batchId = _JobSubscriberBatchID
  SET @listId = listid
  /* nom de la campagne email d'où le subscriber a cliqué sur le lien de désabonnement */
  SET @emailName = emailname_
ELSE 
    Redirect("https://pub.info.agnesb.com/error")
ENDIF{noformat}

*Cas 1 : Contact du CRM (ID commence par 003) => Afficher la bonne cloud page de désabonnement* 

*Cas 2 : Contact hors CRM (ID ne commence pas par 003) => Rediriger vers la page d’erreur* 

Alors on peut déduire que le fonctionnement actuel du lien du désabonnement est normal et voulu.

Est ce que ce filtre est toujours d’actualité ? Si oui on peut garder cette configuration. 

Merci, 

FYI [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:62a0ae97122dfd0069065c84] ;Bonjour [~accountid:61829b48892c420072eac0f5] 



Je viens de refaire le test avec mon adresse email [yoro.jaouen@agnesb.fr|mailto:yoro.jaouen@agnesb.fr] depuis le lien de désinscription de la NL Welcome US et j’arrive de nouveau sur la page d’erreur.

Description:
“Hi Everyone, 

I hope you are doing all well. 

It seems that we have an issue with the assignment of the products. The issue comes mainly from the Children category. 

Here an example for the french website (storefront_catalog_EU):

Here are the products we have in each category in Akeneo.

Here the category for GIRL

!image (20).png|width=100%,alt="image (20).png"!

Here the category for BOY



!image (21).png|width=100%,alt="image (21).png"!

And here the number of products in SFCC categories:

Here the category for GIRL



!image (22).png|width=100%,alt="image (22).png"!

Here the category for BOY : 



!image (23).png|width=100%,alt="image (23).png"!

I don't understand why we have more products on SFCC compared to Akeneo. Do you have an idea why this happened? 

Have a great day “

[~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832]  

cc [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] 

SFCC does not have mechanism to remove product assignments in automatic way.
But this could be done manually, I will fix it manually today. 

Basically the flow is:

# Go to product search: Select only assigned products and click find.


!Screenshot_146-20240507-104349.png|width=1910,height=1060,alt="Screenshot_146-20240507-104349.png"!

# Click “Edit all”

!Screenshot_147-20240507-104527.png|width=1902,height=1055,alt="Screenshot_147-20240507-104527.png"!
# Click “Unassigned products from Catalog Categories

!Screenshot_148-20240507-104611.png|width=1900,height=954,alt="Screenshot_148-20240507-104611.png"!
# Click “Unassigned from all Site Catalog Categories (Storefront_Catalog_US) 
Note: This could be done for each site Catalog, you just should repeat these steps for every site

!Screenshot_149-20240507-104704.png|width=1900,height=775,alt="Screenshot_149-20240507-104704.png"!
# Click “Next” And finish the process. 
Wait Batch job to finish.

cc: [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;Hello [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] 

My solution is to unassigned all products from specific category and then run the storefront import job.

+Steps+:

# Unassign all products from specific category. Choose any

!image-20240522-062934.png|width=1908,height=928,alt="image-20240522-062934.png"!

# In this example, I chose *Bags_Women_leather_goods_US* and all it’s subcategories

!image-20240522-063121.png|width=1898,height=825,alt="image-20240522-063121.png"!

# Hit Find and after that click Edit all

!image-20240522-063329.png|width=1894,height=935,alt="image-20240522-063329.png"!
# Mark Unassign product from Catalog Categories and hit Next

!image-20240522-063431.png|width=1906,height=855,alt="image-20240522-063431.png"!
# Mark Unassign from Select Catalog Categories and hit Next

!image-20240522-063532.png|width=1919,height=812,alt="image-20240522-063532.png"!
# Check categories you want the products in the initial search to be unassign, in this example I chose the same categories. Click next and finish the process - Go to batch process Job and check the result at the most right.

!image-20240522-063631.png|width=1914,height=922,alt="image-20240522-063631.png"!
# Go to Administration Jobs and run Differential import Storefront job. In this example we run US one. Hit Run Now.

!image-20240522-063850.png|width=1916,height=954,alt="image-20240522-063850.png"!


Once you finish this process, all assignments in *Bags_Women_leather_goods_US* will be according to the assignments in Akeneo.

For specific categories as Sales and new Co or any other category you can repeat the same steps. 
This process is very quick one although there are 7 steps. I just did detailed breakdown but it’s super quick.
- Unassignment takes around 1 minute
- Storefront Import Job runs up to 10 mins

Let me know if you have any questions.

[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] ;Yes, [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] the 2 combined solutions helps you to:

#  have an unassign process for unregular changes (described by Petar below)
# using Categorization Rule depending on some fields from Akeneo for the category assignement that change very regularly (like New product). For this second option, it’s finally tested and approved on our hands.

A job has been planed every hour to calculate the new assignements on all Storefront Catalog (US, EU, UK) that has Rules defined. This job will evaluate all the activated rules on Categories and reassign the products on those category that match the specified criteria (max: 5). 

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
Be careful, a category can have both Dynamic and Manual Assignements working together so if you are not happy with the final result, this might come from the manual Assignement you need to manage manually (with the option 1 described by Petar).

I think that you won’t use Manual assignement so you should begin the work by unassign all Products of the category you are testing before seting new rule.
{panel}





Here is an example of Rule on this category: [+Femme_PAP_Nouvelle_Collection_EU+|https://staging-eu01-agnesb.demandware.net/on/demandware.store/Sites-Site/default/ViewChannelCatalog_52-Browse?CatalogCategoryID=4f7a7191b821b5e1a0e8242549&CatalogID=Storefront_Catalog_EU&BackTo=CategoryList] (last tab Categorization Rules).

!image-20240522-174056.png|width=489,height=113,alt="image-20240522-174056.png"!

You can adjust it to your needs:

!image-20240522-174127.png|width=1325,height=775,alt="image-20240522-174127.png"!

Once it’s set, you can Preview the list of product (Preview button) to check the list. If the list is ok, you can save it and it will apply for the long term (every hour recalculated).

Please tell me you need anything to fit your need regarding those categories.;Hi [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67]

I have a question about the assignation of a product to a category. Today I want to do a clean up, because I put some product in the category OUTLET and they should not appear anymore on any other categories on our FR website. 

In akeneo the categorisation is updated and clean (the products only appear on the OUTLET cat and nothing else).


My question is if I follow your clean up theory, of de-assign every product from the catalog. This action will be immediate, but then the new communication from Akeneo about categorisation and where a product has to be or not, won't be instantaneous right? so for few seconds/ minutes I will have not product on my website, is that right? 

Have a great day

Chiara

Summary: Loading times and blocking on returns
Description:
The return generation bugs and the windmill is endless.
It happens after the "Proceed to return" action.

In addition, all the actions are quite long, with the loader at every step.
We thought this was related to staging, but we have the same thing in production.
From my understanding, the loader is there "just in case", but not at every step.
Can you explain this slowness?

!image-20240502-115813.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240502-115813.png"!
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
[~accountid:5efe11d06fddfb0bb40896c1] [~accountid:712020:ebac7c57-90f8-4784-aa37-cd3463dd2d3b] The label generation is fixed

[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] For your order, the phone number was empty on the Fulfillment Order. Is this normal ?;I’m always blocked in production to create a return : 



!image-20240506-163112.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240506-163112.png"!;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] about that ticket we cannot do much thing because we are making a call from the SFCC front to the OMS SF backoffice and the spinner is loaded the time to get the answer from the OMS. We don’t recommend to change the out of the box OMS cartridge included in our scope. 

In case we should redo all the logic and behavior behind we have to estimate the work to do and it is a change request. Do you want me to estimate ?

FYI [~accountid:712020:ebac7c57-90f8-4784-aa37-cd3463dd2d3b] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] just to clarify, the long loading after the return is created is because no return label is generated, and we have logic to recheck if label has been generated 15 times, every 4 seconds. Sometimes there is no label, that’s why the spinner is showing for so long, even though the return creation itself is quite fast. This one we can adjust.

For the other loading on the pages before that on the other hand, we can’t do much.;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] COuld you share the order you’re using?

Description:
The blog URLs don't seem correct to me

[https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/b-Spirit?cid=09032024_BSpiritHome_PresAH24&_gl=1*13fggy9*_up*MQ..*_ga*NjE0OTk3MDY1LjE3MTQzOTU5Nzk.*_ga_D0M27QY9W3*MTcxNDM5NTk3OS4xLjEuMTcxNDM5NjE1MC4wLjAuMA..|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/b-Spirit?cid=09032024_BSpiritHome_PresAH24&_gl=1*13fggy9*_up*MQ..*_ga*NjE0OTk3MDY1LjE3MTQzOTU5Nzk.*_ga_D0M27QY9W3*MTcxNDM5NTk3OS4xLjEuMTcxNDM5NjE1MC4wLjAuMA..]

The desired format for URLs should be /b-spirit/category/article-title (without spaces, dashes, accents, or special characters).

[https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/spirit/b-spirit-home/the-womens-2024-autumn-winter-collection-presentation|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/spirit/b-spirit-home/the-womens-2024-autumn-winter-collection-presentation]

[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]
Creator: Margaux Zermati
Comment:
Even by removing the GA4 tracking parameter, the URL format is still incorrect. Here's an example without parameter :

[https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/b-Spirit?cid=04042024_Arts_Rirkrit|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/b-Spirit?cid=04042024_Arts_Rirkrit] ;[~accountid:712020:9938fca8-2f04-4c88-96a0-038cabdac283] We’ve made a code change to have the correct URL structure for the blog landing page and categories, but we can’t change the last part part of the URL - by default SFCC uses
 {{... /<content asset ID>.html}} to map a URL to a content asset. So it looks like this:

{noformat}/b.spirit/in-the-street/09042024_Street_Nine.html{noformat}

If you want to change the last part, you can rename the content asset ID - but we can’t remove the {{.html}} at the end without significant code change.

cc [~accountid:712020:20f7ecd6-f40a-4986-a404-5e1b815540dd] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f]

Thanks,

Clement

Summary: [PROD] - Comment procéder à une commande depuis l'OMS ?
Description:
Bonjour [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0],

Je n’ai pas trouvé la fonctionnalité pour passer une commande directement depuis l’OMS (choix du produit, taill etc). 

Exemple de situation:

En tant que personal shopper, j’aide un client à passer une commande et le fait payer  par Pay by link. 
Je dois pouvoir choisir les articles, créer un compte au client s’il n’en a pas ou pouvoir retrouver son compte existant, saisir l’adresse de livraison et facturation si différente, choisir le mode livraison, emballage cadeau ou non etc. 

Merci pour ton aide, 

CC [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]
Creator: Hannah Moise
Comment:
[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Concernant cette fonctionnalité je confirme qu’il avait été décider que cela soit opéré par Cegid et par conséquent le passage de commande à la place du client avait été sorti du périmètre en fin de design.

Que souhaitez-vous faire exactement et depuis quel support ? Vous pouvez lire les solutions proposées par Lionel ci-dessous et nous donner un retour en fonction de votre décision.

FYI [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] ;Bonjour [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ,

Il n’a jamais été décidé de ça!

Nous avons toujours parler des commandes PS depuis l’OMS. 

On doit s’appeler d’urgence.

Le besoin a été evoqué plusieurs fois pendant les workshop. Le PS est un vrai besoin chez nous.

 [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] , à ne pas confondre avec l’Order in store.

Le PS peut créer des commandes depuis l’OMS à la place des clients, depuis SFCC.

Merci;With [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] we have agreed on that the SFCC platform is not responsible for sending the email with the PayByLink payment url. This should be handle as it is currently in the old implementation of AgnesB.

[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] [~accountid:60f91d9d2b56cc0069832a09] ;Hello,

I tested on the DEV environment for all US, UK, and EU sites. I tested with all shipping methods and with all payment methods: Google Pay, credit card, PayPal, and the new payment method PayByLink is added to the order on behalf profile:

!image-20240626-111818.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-111818.png"!

When the order is placed,  the agent can go to Adyen’s account and create a payment link: 

!image-20240626-113019.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-113019.png"!

When the customer opens the link for payment he can pay with different payment methods: 

!image-20240626-112100.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-112100.png"!

When he enters his payment details the payment is successful: 

!image-20240626-113141.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-113141.png"!

Then go to BM and wait 1 minute, the job should be run automatically and the payment status of the order will be changed to: Paid and New. The order is sent to the OMS and the customer receives an order confirmation email: 

!image-20240626-113352.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-113352.png"!

!image-20240626-113439.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-113439.png"!

!image-20240626-120051.png|width=1536,height=864,alt="image-20240626-120051.png"!



Only the Oney payment method should be disabled from the manual link.

There is one issue related to the EN version of the EU site - the email is sent in FR language, so [~accountid:712020:20f7ecd6-f40a-4986-a404-5e1b815540dd]  is checking this. 

Thanks,
Gergana;Presentation planned the 19th of July to share the user guide: [+https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4703813646/Order+on+Behalf+of+a+Shopper+|https://www.google.com/url?q=https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4703813646/Order%2Bon%2BBehalf%2Bof%2Ba%2BShopper&sa=D&source=calendar&ust=1721044639579873&usg=AOvVaw0UEzIiHaKEPJvnO8rltDrZ];Hello, We create a new ticket about the bugs : [https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/browse/AGN-622|https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/browse/AGN-622|smart-link]

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] ;Il faut bien une nouvelle commande pour vérifier que la donnée à transiter correctement de CC à SOM. 
Je pourrais modifier les données à la main si tu veux sur les FO mais ce ne sera pas pour tester ce ticket.;Suite aux tests, on confirme qu’il n’y a pas d’automatisme pour copier l’ean de l’Order Item sur le produit.
Cela a été fait en environnment de test ; vous devez maintenant valider sur Staging avant qu’on ne pousse ce change.
Pour tester, j’ai supprimer l’ean d’un produit puis ai refait une commande sur ce même produit ; j’ai pu constaté que l’EAN qui provient d’Akeneo s’est bien copié sur le produit: [https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Product2/01tAa000006ZTrwIAG/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Product2/01tAa000006ZTrwIAG/view];Cette tâche est attribuée à [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] et [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;[~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] ce ticket t’a été assigné vu que l’action est à mener côté Akeneo. Je te laisse consulter les commentaires et nouz dire si les correctifs de staging sont corrects.;Bonjour Sarah, puis-je avoir plus de détails sur le pb? 

Je confirme que nous avons les EAN sur nos fiches produits dans Akeneo. 

!image-20240429-075447.png|width=596,height=868,alt="image-20240429-075447.png"!



Bonne journée

Chiara;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] il est primordial que nous puissions avancer sur ce sujet dans la journée pour être en mesure de dérouler les autres flux.

cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] ;Le statut est le suivant: l’EAN côté Produit (qui est bien récupéré d’Akeneo donc rien à faire côté [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] ) est transmis à l’OMS et désormais copier sur l’objet Product2 automatiquement (uniquement en environment de TEST - DEV ou STG, peu importe).

Ce changement doit être validé sur la sandbox avant que nous puissions déployer ce changement sur la PROD. J’ignore qui doit le faire côté Agnès b.;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] voici le résultat du passage de commande, nous sommes KO dans le MWA

[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000017u9lIAA/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000017u9lIAA/view]

cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;The evolution we did is only for Product of Agnès b. collection, not the shipping Method products.
[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Product2/01t1x00000NILqcAAH|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Product2/01t1x00000NILqcAAH]



The UPG delivery method didn’t have any EAN ; it’s fixed now. ([~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] to check in Production);Pushed in production so next orders will be pushable to CEGID.

Description:
[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] , [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] m’informe qu’il a crée 2 commandes avec de la remise US24001057
C&C avec remise et US24001058-FO1
SFS avec remise aucune de ces commandes ne disposent de remise dans Y2 (champ montant et motif). 

Je pense que [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] tu as peut-être touché aux champs GrosUnitPrice et NetUnitPrice et enlever le motif (car nous avions besoin de trouver une solution de contournement pour le C&C). Peux-tu regarder ce que tu reçois de la part de SF, s’il te plaît?

Merci
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
Bonjour [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] ,

Je confirme que j’ai passé ces deux commandes avec un article à prix réduit.

Vous pouvez regarder le price book du SKU : 8249JHS5_050-1

J’ai passé ces commandes avec un prix barré et un prix réduit en rouge.

Nous avons une regression à ce niveau. C’est peut-être lié à la configuration qui n’est appliqué que sur 1 SKU et non pas la REF, mais cela reste un bug. Si une commande est passée avec un prix réduit sur un SKU, cette donnée doit retombée.

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] ;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] Peux tu regarder côté SFCC ?;Hi, this is how the orders looks in SFCC:



!image-20240424-151811.png|width=1878,height=638,alt="image-20240424-151811.png"!



Is it the same in other systems?

[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] Can you check on OMS side if you have the same order total?



update: order id *US24001057*;The discount is from a pricebook, so there is no price adjustment in the order, even though you see a red price on pdp/cart

if tyou want a price adjustment to appear in the order, you need to set up a promotion. 

When the price is reduced from a pricebook, there is no data in the order about all the other pricebook prices. 

[~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] / [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]

On STG the configurable pop-up is also displayed, when the pop-in is shown, it sets up a Cookie with ID isConfigurablePopinShown and it should be deleted to be shown again.

Summary: MWA - la MWA indique que la commande EU24000999-FO1 n’existe pas dans Y2
Description:
[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000016WJBIA2/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000016WJBIA2/view]

[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] la MWA indique que la commande EU24000999-FO1 n’existe pas dans Y2.

Si l’action est liée à une annulation, il doit y avoir un contrôle sur l’envoi ou non de la donnée dans Y2.

Quelle action a été menée sur cette commande?

Merci

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f]
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] 

Nous sommes dans le cas ou un C&C a été mis à disposition du client (donc création du MDW action)

Ensuite ce Fulfillment Order a été annulé, ce qui explique l’erreur.



Nous pouvons passer les MDW actions à Canceled ou les supprimer dans ce cas de figure.

[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] qu’en pensez vous ?;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] Si l’annulation a été faite par la boutique dans BayRetail (annulation ou non confirmation) parce que le stock n'était pas disponible, Y2 ne doit pas être notifié de l’annulation. Nous ne devons donc pas recevoir de notification dans le MWA. S’agit-il de ce cas là?

cc [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] ;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Je ne connais pas l’explication métier, mais de notre côté dès qu’une commande est passée à WaitingCustomerPickup nous notifions Y2
[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Savez vous pourquoi ce Fulfillment Order a été Waiting Customer Pickup puis les quantités ont été annulées ?

[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/FulfillmentOrder/0a3Aa00000038DxIAI/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/FulfillmentOrder/0a3Aa00000038DxIAI/view];[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Nous avons corrigé le problème, lorsqu’un utilisateur essaye de passer un CC à canceled, le FO reste à to be canceled (et n’est donc pas encore annulé);Ok donc à reproduire en prod

[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0]

Description:
[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] en développant un fichier en sortie de Y2, je visualise que le champ TransactionNumber n’est pas reçu dans Y2. Est-ce que tu le mets à disposition de Talend. 

L’information est bien dans le livrable mais il est mentionné comme non mappé dans l’OMS.

Ce champ est mandatory pour le flux à mettre à disposition de la comptabilité.

Merci

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] 

!image-20240422-160059.png|width=1907,height=809,alt="image-20240422-160059.png"!
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Quel est l’attendu ? Le gateaway ref number ?


Que se passe t’il si une commande Paypal (capture au paiement) est divisée en 2 fulfillment order ? (nous aurons le même TransactionNumber pour les 2)



[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] PI;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] je complète le ticket en // des échanges sur le chat. Avoir 2 transactionnumber identique pour 2 fullfillment orders à livrer au client est accepté.;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] Peux tu prendre le GatewayRefNumber de la Query 2 ?



Si c’est correct, je mettrai à jour le CI;The documentation has been updated to priviledge the TransactionId field against the AuthorizationId in CEGID.
A business rule has been added to manage the case where we don’t have PaymentAuthorization and only a Payment (Paypal, Oney [in production only]).

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QQNU2psBpPTJMslcMbjSrVosN8R3D9j7C_Rxx1mknCA/edit#gid=1645324516|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QQNU2psBpPTJMslcMbjSrVosN8R3D9j7C_Rxx1mknCA/edit#gid=1645324516];[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] prend le sujet d’ici ce mardi soir.

cc [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;à partir des informations Proximis fournit par [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

!image-20240424-085401.png|width=1616,height=481,alt="image-20240424-085401.png"!

ce qui est récupéré dans Y2 sur cette commande, le numéro PSP en rouge est sur 15 caractères alphanumériques.

!image-20240424-085538.png|width=1107,height=856,alt="image-20240424-085538.png"!

ici ce qui est envoyé à Y2 suite au développement de [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] 

!image-20240424-085753.png|width=1101,height=780,alt="image-20240424-085753.png"!

Sébastien Berlioz me confirme qu’il n’a pas besoin du numéro d’autorisation. 

Je valide donc le développement [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f]

Thank you, ;No we don’t have the back in stock notification email in SFCC either [~accountid:61829b48892c420072eac0f5] [https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4365189291/Transactional+emails|https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4365189291/Transactional+emails|smart-link] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] is this a new request?;We forgot this email when we made the list with Lionel. What are the solutions for adding this quickly? cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;Hello [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] , can you udapte me about this please ? We want the same footer and header like other template. Can you confirm me : * we can have a text different for US, UK and EU? * we can have product detail ? like order confirmation * the stock is available when the email is send ? or there aren’t stock Here what we want in french : “Bonjour {fullName},

Vous avez récemment ajouté de jolies pièces à votre panier.
Bonne nouvelle, elles sont toujours disponibles!
Nos stocks sont limités, n'attendez plus pour passer votre commande.
Besoin d'un conseil? Contactez notre service Personal Shopper. Ne laissez pas vos pièces favorites vous échapper!.

Merci et à bientôt.
Le Service Client agnès b.
