Description:
We had asked for a "free" HTML popin so that we could disclose important messages.
Could you please tell us how to configure it?

cc [~accountid:631b58598473817d7d0698eb] [~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] , [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] FYI

we have a preference on both Popins ( Newletter and this configurable popin) to chose upon how many seconds the customer can see them appearing. 

for example : You can set up to make the newsletter appear after 20 seconds and this configurable popin after 30 seconds) 

But if a customer opens a quickview for example and spends 20 seconds  thinking what attributes to chose on the products to purchase he will have the NL appearing and later after 30 seconds he will see the configurable one. 

This UX will frustrate the customer, that’s why we will add a priority logic on popins to check which one's timer is higher and always show it second. so for ex. if NEWSLETTER is 20sec and Configurable Popin is 30sec, the NL will always show 1st and will have the priority of display, until it’s closed then the countdown for the other configurable Popin will start. 

This will handle the case where both are supposed to be shown to a customer. 

cc [~accountid:712020:3a759d56-f9c7-477d-9ede-cab93a17cf42] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Update, a better & simpler solution was found to avoid having many popins at the same time ( example with quickview bellow) : 

The new logic will be if the user already has a an open modal, the NL and CP popins will show on refresh or next page load, otherwise they will show after X seconds after loading the site.

This will be added to documentation. 

Thnx;Hello [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ,

Here you can find how to configure the pop-up - [https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4600430610/Configurable+Popin+configuration+steps|https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4600430610/Configurable+Popin+configuration+steps|smart-link] 

Thanks,
Gergana;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] , we need to test this.

thanks;Hello [~accountid:60f91d9d2b56cc0069832a09] ,

Ok for this.

Thanks

Description:
[^Tests.zip]

As part of the preparation for the upcoming Go Live, we need to implement this static HTML page. This page will serve as a maintenance page whenever one of the Agnès sites is undergoing maintenance.

* *Maintenance page* : static html pages that can include self-hosted js, css files : 
** Do not support the localisation approach used for other pages
** Text and content should be the same through all websites based on the mockup provided by the customer
** Configured from a zip file uploaded in SFCC
** Consider the files uploaded via that zip import to be independent from the sites themselves and their resources. They will be activated in the context of a normal file hosting server and independent of the SFCC content or other server-side features

Link to FSD : [https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4583292929/Maintenance+Page|https://baybridgedigital.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AGNESB/pages/4583292929/Maintenance+Page|smart-link]

Summary: Flow28_T_ETABLISSEMENT need to be added in the API
Description:
[~accountid:621397d1468c2e00716e2e77] [~accountid:70121:f04eecc8-cdaa-41c0-9f20-68bb962ebbe8] I added the field T_ETABLISSEMENT in the flat file 028. We need to add it in the Talend Job as soon as possible.

This rule allows to manage properly the link between customer and order.

We have to wait for the new delivery from BDD with your best practices.

So we need to add this field in the UpdateCustomer.

The documentation has been completed

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hmEZzW1GtCrIDjYzA0uSSzE_q28h1IAoRDOJZsYOU50/edit#gid=733270162|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hmEZzW1GtCrIDjYzA0uSSzE_q28h1IAoRDOJZsYOU50/edit#gid=733270162|smart-link]

Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
Hello 

le titre c'est flow21 et dans le description on parle du flux  28 ?;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] Est ce qu’on parle l’ancienne version du flux 28 

 car pour l’instant la nouvelle version n'est pas encore déployé ;Ce ticket a été créé par Sabine lorsque l’information T_ETABLISSEMENT a été ajouté dans le fichier du flux 28. Le contrat d’interface avait été modifié en conséquence. Si tu as respecté le contrat d’interface avec ce champ supplémentaire, ce ticket est livré dans ta version et il n’y a rien à faire.;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] comment pouvons-nous tester ce use case depuis le site? est-ce qu’il est nécessaire d’avoir fait une commande sur la zone EU par exemple et d’en passer une seconde sur la zone US?

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;Dans le sens RCU vers CEGID, à partir du moment où le client a un établissement de rattachement bien défini (ce qui est censé être le cas dès sa création), il suffit de faire une commande ou une e-resa sur un autre Site pour constater que l'établissement change. Un middleaction doit être créé en conséquence pour faire la mise à jour dans CEGID (flux 21). Pour ce qui concerne ce ticket et donc le flux 28, il s’agit uniquement de l'établissement de rattachement CEGID qui doit être synchronisé de CEGID vers le RCU ; j’ignore quel use case CEGID serait le plus pertinent dans ce sens (uniquement la création ? aussi modification du rattachement par un admin?);[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] pas d’action nécessaire dans Y2 l’information doit redescendre depuis SF. C’est pour cela que je demande quelle action menée par le client sur le site. Aucune action de type ADMIN ne doit être requise non plus.

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] ;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc]  ce ticket est il toujours d’actualité ?

Summary: Flow28_T_ETABLISSEMENT has been added in the flat file
Description:
[~accountid:621397d1468c2e00716e2e77] [~accountid:70121:f04eecc8-cdaa-41c0-9f20-68bb962ebbe8] I added the field T_ETABLISSEMENT in the flat file 028. We need to add it in the Talend Job as soon as possible.

This rule allows to manage properly the link between customer and order.

We have to wait for the new delivery from BDD with your best practices.

cc [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] [~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7]
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] 

[~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] is working on the flow 028 to fixe some remarks that I made on the Job about Talend best practices. So I do not think that it’s a good idea to change the flat file 028 right now because that create some error or wrong data mapping while reading the file.

When [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] is done, will add the field T_ETABLISSEMENT in the Talend.



Thank you

[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f]  [~accountid:62f2157fe50f2f2a39568bd1]  [~accountid:70121:f04eecc8-cdaa-41c0-9f20-68bb962ebbe8]  ;J’ai ajouté le champ technique SalesForce créé par [~accountid:6040e2c1c58c720071472017] dans la documentation du flux 28 

T_ETABLISSEMENT = CEGID_etablissement_rattachement

cc [~accountid:621397d1468c2e00716e2e77] [~accountid:70121:f04eecc8-cdaa-41c0-9f20-68bb962ebbe8] [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] ;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] D’accord. En effet il faudra rajouter ce champ lors de la lecture du fichier dans talend + mapping de sa valeur.
Concernant l’ajout dans le fichier a quel endroit exactement il doit se placer? Si vous avez un exemple du fichier avec le champ T_ETABLISSEMENT inclut.
;Hello [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] [~accountid:621397d1468c2e00716e2e77] 

CC [~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] 

Le contrat d’interface [#21 - OMS/RCU -> Talend -> CEGID Y2 - Customer Update|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hmEZzW1GtCrIDjYzA0uSSzE_q28h1IAoRDOJZsYOU50/edit?usp=sharing] est à jour, comprenant le mapping avec le champ “CEGID_etablissement_rattachement__pr.Shop_Number__c” (T_ETABLISSEMENT).

 Ce champ est alimenté automatiquement dans salesforce:

* Lorsque le compte client est créé depuis commerce cloud, le champ “CEGID_etablissement_rattachement__pr.Shop_Number__c correspond à l'établissement de création. 
* Lorsque le compte client passe une commande/e-reservation depuis commerce cloud, le champ “CEGID_etablissement_rattachement__pr.Shop_Number__c correspond à la boutique associée à la commande/e-reservation.;FYI et action [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] ;est ce que le ticket est toujours d’actualité ?;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] en principe ce champ est visible dans le fichier 28 adressé par Y2 et à destination de Talend.

Comment:
[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

Before UPS was generating the label in GIF (the available formats are GIF, ZPL, EPL and SPL in the Shipment API).

These formats were not displayed well on Bayretail App, it was agreed that PDF format was expecting



We had to do an extra call (Label Recovery) to get a PDF version and this is the result of this call ;Hello [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] ,

I understand that we've agreed on PDF, but on the same format as ZPL, otherwise we can't print our labels.
Is it possible to modify?
If not, we'll have to generate the ZPL from the tablet.

Thanks

cc [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;Hello, as talked, [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] will contact UPS to check if they can provide a PDF (ZPL format is not supported in the scope). If further developments are needed on Bayretail side, a change request will be done. ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

Today some PDF labels have been print by [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] and it seems OK. Can we close this topic if it’s working fine?

Or send me an order.

thanks;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] i confirm it was ok

Summary: Liste des champs disponibles en saisie de fiche client depuis Servcie cloud
Description:
Il y a plein de champs disponibles mais non saisissables dans le formulaire de création des compte depuis Service cloud. La liste des champs saisissables et donc affichée en création est: Civilité, Prénom, Nom, Email, Téléphone mobile, Téléphone, optin NL, optin SMS, date de naissance, Adresse postale, langue de communication. 
Les champs obligatoires sont: Prénom, Nom, civilité et au moins un moyen de contact donc soit tel, soit tel mobile soit email.

Tous les autres champs ne doivent pas être affichés dans le formulaire de création.


Merci
Creator: Anne Barroy
Comment: Hello [~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] , le champ “Langue de communication” est aussi requis par cegid ,il devrait donc être obligatoire  ;[~accountid:62f2157fe50f2f2a39568bd1] j’ai changé les droits sur les champs (lecture/obligatoire). Pourriez-vous s’il vous plaît vérifier que c’est correct ? merci;[~accountid:6040e2c1c58c720071472017] : ok pour ajouter la langue de communication en obligatoire. Pour le moment, je vois toujours tous les champs quand je créé une fiche compte depuis SF. C’est peut-être parceque j’ai els droits admin ?;[~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] oui en tant qu’Admin tu peux voir et éditer tous les champs. Il faut se connecter en tant qu’un utilisateur service client pour se rendre compte des modifications apportées.;[~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] nous avions vu ensemble comment changer la mise en page en production et tu avais pu apporter des modifications. Je cloture donc ce ticket.

Summary: C1-CustomerCreation - Error - Date Of Birth - Format
Description:
Comme identifié par [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] ce message d’erreur correspond à un format de date de naissance qui serait erroné quand la date de naissance est vide. Pouvez-vous corriger l’anomalie dès que possible [~accountid:6040e2c1c58c720071472017] [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] 

[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000015SMTIA2/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000015SMTIA2/view]

s:Envelope xmlns:s="[http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/|http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/]">s:Body>s:Fault>faultcode xmlns:a="[http://schemas.microsoft.com/net/2005/12/windowscommunicationfoundation/dispatcher|http://schemas.microsoft.com/net/2005/12/windowscommunicationfoundation/dispatcher]">a:DeserializationFailed/faultcode>faultstring xml:lang="fr-FR">The formatter threw an exception while trying to deserialize the message: There was an error while trying to deserialize parameter [http://www.cegid.fr/Retail/1.0:customerData|http://www.cegid.fr/Retail/1.0:customerData]. The InnerException message was 'There was an error deserializing the object of type Cegid.Retail.Services.ThirdParties.Customers.CustomerInsertData. The value '' cannot be parsed as the type 'Int32'.'. Please see InnerException for more details./faultstring>/s:Fault>/s:Body>/s:Envelope>



cc [~accountid:62f2157fe50f2f2a39568bd1] [~accountid:70121:f04eecc8-cdaa-41c0-9f20-68bb962ebbe8] [~accountid:621397d1468c2e00716e2e77]
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] si nous ne recevons pas de date, quelle information devons-nous renseigner ? Aujourd’hui Nathaniel met la valeur à null.;[~accountid:6040e2c1c58c720071472017] Le contrat d’interface mentionne 3 champs, la valeur par défaut dans Y2 est 01/01/1900. Donc essaie avec 01 (Jour), 01 (Mois), 1900 (Année).

merci de ton retour rapide

!image-20240418-090540.png|width=1882,height=98,alt="image-20240418-090540.png"!;Autre option qui me semble aussi valable, ne pas envoyer de sous champ pour la date de naissance si elle est vide.

Au lieu de : 

{noformat}         <ns1:BirthDateData>
           <ns1:BirthDateDay/>
           <ns1:BirthDateMonth/>
           <ns1:BirthDateYear/>
        </ns1:BirthDateData>{noformat}

On enverrait :

{noformat}         <ns1:BirthDateData/>{noformat}



Testé avec succès sur SOAP UI.;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Bonjour,

J'ai effectué des tests en insérant 01 (jour), 01 (mois) et 1900 (année) dans mon mappage lorsque la date de naissance ({{personBirthDate}}) est nulle. Cela semble fonctionner correctement. J'ai également modifié le champ "Retry attempt" pour pouvoir le récupérer dans mon job.

Le dossier est à jour avec le statut "success" : [lien vers l'enregistrement|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000015SMTIA2/view].

Pour information, je suis en train d'apporter des modifications aux flux et de lancer des jobs en conséquence. Si vous ne trouvez pas toutes les données entre Cegid et les fichiers plats, cela signifie probablement qu'elles se trouvent dans mon FTP pour effectuer les tests.;[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] oui j’ai traité; [~accountid:712020:523ad2a5-3ddf-40a9-b026-566c02286ae7] ok for you ?

[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc]

Description:
In a receipt, we have 2 problems .

In attachment, the receipt for the order US24001011.

* We don’t see a promotion on product. I have a reduction on product (15% on prefered product).

Summary: Order summary does not work in the check-out:
Description:
Order summary does not work in the check-out:

* Sales tax: even if Avalara is not activated, we should have taxes automatically? [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] Petar told me this, but I'm not sure if it's mandatory.
* Estimated total: doesn't work.

!image-20240416-103901.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240416-103901.png"!
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] in order for the the taxes to be calculated correctly using default functionality, there are 2 points:

# Taxation rules should be defined - on STG this is done
# Products should have a tax class specified - on STG this is the issue, because the products have no tax class - undefined. 

Is the tax class supposed supposed to be populated by the Akeneo job [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] ? 
!image-20240417-070053.png|width=505,height=410,alt="image-20240417-070053.png"!
EDIT: looking in the code, the default tax class should be used in these cases, so I’ll have to check why that’s not the case.

EDIT 2: After some more investigation, I found out that actually even though the tax classes have been defined, the rates haven’t been populated:

!image-20240417-072447.png|width=1534,height=374,alt="image-20240417-072447.png"!



So in conclusion, the default tax calculation works like this:

# If a product has a taxClass, it is used. The taxClass can also be inherited from the master.
# If the product doesn’t have taxClass defined, the taxClass marked as “default” is used to calculate the tax.
# On US, the default tax class is the “General clothing” one:
!image-20240417-072840.png|width=1504,height=479,alt="image-20240417-072840.png"!
#  but it doesn’t have any rate defined 
!image-20240417-072942.png|width=719,height=606,alt="image-20240417-072942.png"!

So the tax calculation fails.

[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] if you want to use the default taxes, we can either mark “Standard” as the default tax class, or you can fill up all the tax rates for the different jurisdictions - but that would also require correct taxClass to be set up on the products. Let me know how you want to proceed.

c [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f]

Comment:
Hello [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

In the screenshot it seems there is no taxation in the product that is in the basket which means the Avalara taxation was not enabled. Description:
The goal of this ticket is to implement a job which will assign avatax item codes to variants. 
- Create tax codes in taxation in BM based on [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gTFNoPxhcuyxIXe4r6QM2QBmKBGS13QdrkM4pu6U_Ms/edit#gid=840195777|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gTFNoPxhcuyxIXe4r6QM2QBmKBGS13QdrkM4pu6U_Ms/edit#gid=840195777|smart-link] 
- Assign from BM tax codes to the variation Groups (Bulk assign)
- create a job to assign tax code to variants based on variation groups item code
Creator: Peter Manev
Comment:
[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] this will need a call with you in order to finalize this task. Can we have it today?

Description:
Hello [~accountid:63bc0cde2a526608c54f66d2] ,

Quelques questions : 
1. Heure de prise en charge

Comment est configuré le magasin Madison ? J’ai passé la commande vers 21h le 11 avril.
Il reste 1h28min avant l’annulation le 12 à 10h30.
Nous ne devons pas annuler les commandes Madison. (voir PJ)

# Picking Zone

Sur le picking des produits, nous avons la zone Roissy et non pas la zone Madison. Pourquoi ? Si nous n’avons pas d’emplacement dans Madison, il faut retirer l’information.

cc [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

!roissy sur madison.jpg|width=1512,height=2016,alt="roissy sur madison.jpg"!



!horaires de prise en charge.jpg|width=1512,height=2016,alt="horaires de prise en charge.jpg"!
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Quelques questions : 

# Heure de prise en charge

Le délais de prise en charge (3h ouvrées pour le ship from store et 24h ouvrées pour le click & collect) est configuré dans l'OMS. 

Néanmoins, il faut bien vérifier dans ton user le set-up de la Time Zone (EUR/ USA). 

# Picking Zone

L’affichage de la picking Zone n’est active que pour les users qui ont la coche ‘warehouse’ activée. Il faut donc bien faire attention à la configuration des users pour les US vs la France. ;Hello [~accountid:63bc0cde2a526608c54f66d2] ,

Je te confirme que pour les US, il n’y a pas de délai de prise en charge, nous avions convenu qu’il devait avoir la même limite que l’entrepôt roissy, car c’est es seuls expéditeurs.

[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] Pour les commandes US, nous avons enlevé l’annulation automatique mais nous continuons à calculer la limite de préparation (qui permet de traiter les commandes au plus vite).
Est ce OK ?;Hello [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] ,

Merci pour ton retour.

Concernant la limite, peut-on la paramétrer différemment des autres boutiques monde ? Ou est-ce un paramètre générique ?

Merci d’avance,

Clément

cc [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] C’est un paramétrage générique
Attachment: horaires de prise en charge.jpg;roissy sur madison.jpg

Livraison UPS

Pour le moyen de paiement, j’ai ABC côté Salesforce, c’est bien ce qui est attendu pour Paypal ?

Que veux tu dire par “dont 1 avec un nom en erreur” ?;Pour les modes de paiement utilisés : PayPal, GooglePay, Visa

ABC : Paypal USD;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Le mode de paiement étant Paypal et la devise USD, nous avons envoyé la bonne valeur.
Une autre idée pour cette erreur ?;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] comme tu as modifié la balise paiement hier peux-tu regarder si la devise figure bien dedans? merci

cc [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] ;Hello,

je n'ai pas modifié la partie Devise, ci dessous ce qui a été envoyé

et quand je regarde je n'ai pas de résultat pour le query3 Order Summary;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] si on regarde l’appel il manque le mode de paiement et la devise. Est-ce que tu les as dans tes logs? Merci

cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] ;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] C’est du à une modification liée à Paypal ! Nous n’avons plus d’autorisation mais une capture directement. Il faut adapter la règle

[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] Il faut que l’on trouve une façon d’appeler de façon conditionnelle l’objet Payment ou PaymentAuthorization;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] je comprends que nous ne devons pas passer de commande sur PayPal en attendant que tu analyses le sujet avec [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] c’est bien ça? 

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]  ;*Problème :* 

Quand c’est un paiement CB nous enregistrons les informations dans l’objet PaymentAuthorization et quand c’est un paiement Paypal, nous enregistrons les informations dans l’objet Payment. Or, l’interface est rédigée uniquement pour PaymentAuthorization



*Solution :* 

J’ai rédigé une query qui appelle les 2 objets en même temps. [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] Es tu capable de venir prendre les informations en fonction de l’objet qui a de la data ?

Si oui, on part sur cette solution

*Nouvelle query:*

select id,
(select id, CurrencyIsoCode, date, GatewayRefNumber, OrderPaymentSummary.CEGIDMethodId__c  from PaymentAuthorizations),
(select id, CurrencyIsoCode, date, GatewayRefNumber, OrderPaymentSummary.CEGIDMethodId__c  from Payments)
 from OrderPaymentSummary where id='0bMAa0000002aH7MAI'



[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] ;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] un retour concernant la demande de Tim ?

[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] ;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] la reco de [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] me semble satisfaisante.

Peux-tu nous confirmer que cette modification peut être traitée ce jour?;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] : l’ajout  de la nouvelle requête pour les cas Paypal est déployé  ;[~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

les tests sont concluants avec une commande payée en Paypal et une commande payée différemment

{quote}I can't access support, I'm asked for salesforce access which I don't have:{quote}

* Can’t help you with this, you should find the account owner and ask for help.



{quote}the "cookie settings" icon is not mandatory.
In the one trust integration, there are two scripts:

* the consent pop-in
* the cookie settings icon.
Please remove the script from the icon.{quote}

We have indeed 2 scripts - but the first one is to block all cookies, and the second one is for the cookies popup and the button. So removing either one won’t help.

I put it in the cart.
From a new page in private browsing, the product is still available and I can add it to the cart.
Normally, the product shouldn't be available if it's already been added to the basket, right?

!image-20240411-183551.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240411-183551.png"!

When the 

cc [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] This is on SFCC side;Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

We have a feature switch for the “basket reservation” feature in Merchant Tools → Custom Preferences → Storefront Configs → Enable inventory reservation

It is currently disabled, because there was a suspected SFCC platform bug which made you unable to proceed to checkout if you add the last item to your basket.

We’ve been following a support thread in the SFCC community, which seems to have recently concluded, that the bug was not with the platform, but with the SFRA base code - meaning we can overwrite it to fix the bug.

We’ll need to implement this fix before this feature can be used.

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] ;[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] 

There are many issues with the soft reservations:

# When an item is reserved it can take 30-40 seconds for the change to be reflected in the OCI inventory - this can lead to many bugs on the storefront: if multiple people try to add the same item - it will look like they succeed, but some will later get an error message in the cart that the product is out of stock, and overall the behavior is quite unpredictable.
# The SFRA base code does not support these reservations - so we will have to overwrite some critical areas, like basketValidationHelpers, adding and updating products to cart - maybe more, but these are the ones I’ve found so far. In any case, these changes will require extensive testing, so we can’t do them 1 day before go-live.
# There might also be an issue with Click&Collect, because if for example there is 1 stock in a store, and 1 stock in the warehouse - first, I don’t know if it’s possible to reserve the stock on the store, but also this reservation is made when first adding the product to the cart, so we don’t know yet what inventory we need in the first place. This will also require investigation.


We can try to open a support ticket with Salesforce to ask what they recommend as a solution, but this feature seems not very well supported yet, so I would not recommend going live with it.

cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] ;Hi Clément,

I will jump in here to explain the situation and ensure you that we will take care of this.

Today, the only issues we have today is that the *Soft reservation* from the SFCC platform doesn’t send us an error when there is 0 product available in the OCI (even few millisecond after the last reservation).



We tested again with Georgi and we can see on direct call to OCI the error message we should also receive when using standard reservation function:

{
    "reservationTime": "2024-04-18T14:11:15.261Z",
    "expirationTime": "2024-04-18T14:16:15.232Z",
    "success": false,
    "groups": [
        {
            "id": "locationGroup_eur",
            "errors": [
                {
                    "sku": "0330S137_890-4",
                    "errorCode": "InsufficientQuantity"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}



We are testing again and if the issue is still confirm, we will raise the issue to Salesforce so they could fix it.

I will get back to you ASAP but be sure that we will take care of this no matter how.;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] We let you read this answer explaining how the platform works. In case you want any change please let us know.

----

Salesforce Response:

Thank you for reaching out. I have the answers to your queries:

# Is this a bug? Should we not call releaseInventory and reserveInventory in the same request?

This behavior is not a bug in the OCI. It is designed this way: when basket.releaseInventory() and
basket.reserveInventory() are called, they check the inventory from SFCC and then proceed with the reservation or
release of the reservation. However, it's important to note that the reservations are created in the OCI server, which is
outside of SFCC/Salesforce. There is a background job in SFCC that runs every minute to fetch the latest details from the
OCI server to SFCC. Therefore, if basket.releaseInventory() is called immediately after basket.reserveInventory(), the
data may not yet be reflected in SFCC because the job might still be in progress. It's recommended to introduce a delay of 1
to 2 minutes between the two calls or you can use the OCI headless API to check stock availability and then perform the
releaseInventory call after confirming the reservations.

# Our client wants to implement inventory reservation when an item is added to the basket for any user (registered or unregistered) - can you advise if this is a vulnerability, since the site can be attacked by bots adding items to baskets, blocking real users from shopping?

This implementation should not pose a vulnerability. SFCC has a feature called temporary reservation, where if the basket
is not converted to an order within a specific amount of time, those reservations will be released automatically. This
ensures that real users can continue to order without encountering any issues.

If you want more detailed information, you can refer to the following documentation links:

* Inventory Availability in Salesforce Commerce API: [https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/commerce/commerce-api/references/inventory-availability?meta=skuAvailabilityByLocationAndOrGroup|https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/commerce/commerce-api/references/inventory-availability?meta=skuAvailabilityByLocationAndOrGroup|smart-link] 



* SFCC Script API Documentation: [https://salesforcecommercecloud.github.io/b2c-dev-doc/docs/current/scriptapi/html/index.html?target=class_dw_order_Basket.html|https://salesforcecommercecloud.github.io/b2c-dev-doc/docs/current/scriptapi/html/index.html?target=class_dw_order_Basket.html|smart-link] 



Please let me know if you need further assistance or clarification on any of these points.;h3. Managing Inventory Reservations and Security Concerns

h4. Overview:

# Temporary discrepancies between the real available quantity and the site’s inventory are caused by soft inventory reservations when multiple items of the same type are added and partially removed from the shopping basket. Discrepancies are automatically fixed when the basket’s lifetime ends. The basket lifetime is 15 minutes. It will be an edge case for customers to be affected by this.
# Soft reservation creates a potential vulnerability to bot attacks that could block inventory by reserving items in baskets. Here’s a concise recommendation to address it:

* *Enhancing Security and Bot Management (Good to have):*
** Implement additional security measures such as Google Captcha v3 to detect and mitigate suspicious activities. Also, we can block traffic patterns typical of bots in eCDN, while Captcha can prevent bots from performing actions like adding items to baskets.
* *Monitoring and Response (Good to have):*
** Establish monitoring mechanisms to track unusual activity patterns or spikes in basket creation which could indicate a bot attack. Early detection will allow for timely interventions.
** Prepare a response protocol to quickly enact IP range blocks or adjust security settings in real-time if an attack is detected. This proactive approach will ensure you can respond effectively to threats without impacting genuine users.

h4. Conclusion:

The steps above will help protect against potential bot attacks. However, the risk of a bot attack is minimal as such an attack will require significant investment from the attacker. It is not a simple brute-force request, it will require a synchronized operation of thousands of bots, IP addresses, and infrastructure. Such a complex attack is not likely.
In my opinion, the risks are small and we can proceed with the soft reservations approach. Then plan the enhancements for the next stage. 

CC: [~accountid:712020:ebac7c57-90f8-4784-aa37-cd3463dd2d3b] , [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] , [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;Another known issue, that I can't find a fix for: sometimes if the customer has reserved some items, and their reservation has expired, and tries to add some more items than there are available, the item can get removed from his basket. Steps to reproduce:

E.g. 5qty product, add 5 qty, go to cart, wait for reservation to expire and ATO to update, try to add 1 more - all items get removed from the basket.

There’s also sometimes issues when reducing quantities of a product in basket, and trying to increase it again immediately - the ATO takes some time to be updated properly.

Description:
The category filter doesn't work for me.
And I don't understand how it works.


On pages where different types of products are presented, we need to have the category filter. (view all, new collection, suits, etc).
This is not the case on all these pages. Sometimes the category is "new collection", whereas there may be lots of different products in the new collection.

!image-20240411-095215.png|width=75%,alt="image-20240411-095215.png"!


The same goes for suits: we have shirts, pants and jackets : 

!image-20240411-095903.png|width=75%,alt="image-20240411-095903.png"!

Same on Artis’t collection : 

!image-20240411-095243.png|width=540,height=298,alt="image-20240411-095243.png"!



On other pages, we don't want to have this category filter. On category pages for girls, dresses, jumpsuits etc :

!image-20240411-095306.png|width=1264,height=589,alt="image-20240411-095306.png"!

The user is not trying to change category here.

In the see all bags, we have a greyed-out category filter, why?
This field does not exist in the list of bag categories.

!image-20240411-095424.png|width=592,height=473,alt="image-20240411-095424.png"!

We need to control this category filter to optimize user search. [~accountid:5efe11d06fddfb0bb40896c1] *


[~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] , can you also take a look at the categories to search for new potential errors.

cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

This is the out of the box filter by Category. Basically, it shows *[subcategories, selected category, parent category]* of the selected category. If there is no subcategories like Suits in the example u sent, it will show only selected one with its parent. I think you need to create another refinement and delete this one for your use case.

Could you elaborate more what exactly should be the use case you want to have as a refinement so I can help you to configure it?;Hi [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] ,

The category filter must be, for the user, the product's girl category (dress, t-shirt, pants, skirts....).
For pages grouping several product types, we need to have this category filter so that customers can refine their searches.

The "suits" page is not a daughter category, but a page grouping several product types.

If we have a "girl category" page (same example: dress, t-shirt, pants, skirts....), then we don't need this category filter.

[~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] , do you agree? Do you have any other ideas?

Ex: 1 - XS - 36
?

!image-20240411-094815.png|width=307,height=673,alt="image-20240411-094815.png"!

cc [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] , Sorry isn’t a bug, can you switch on Task please.;Hi everyone, 

Thank you for your ticket. Sadly I can’t do the matching because it’s impossible to know which size corresponds to which. Agnès b. sizing is very specific and unique. 

Exemple 27US corresponds to the size between 26 (french) and 38 (french). The matching does not apply here. 

As well, a size S, I don’t think, corresponds to a 36 for agnès b. 

Our clients know our sizing method and we have worked like this in the past.

As well, I don’t recall someone explaining how this could be done on SFCC

Have a great day

Hi can you please provide the screen resolution of your browsers and more importantly the height since there is no issue with the smallest desktop screens that I test. Description:
The language of communication is defined in relation to the site on which the customer has created an account.

Example: if the account is created on FR, then the language of communication is French.

It is not possible to modify. If the customer moves to another country, their language of communication will remain French.
Creator: johanna.meireles
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:63c6537a6178fcc941d8808a] ,  Est-ce que le service client peux ajouter et/ou modifier cette valeur à la création/modification de fiche dans le RCU ?;Hello, [~accountid:6040e2c1c58c720071472017] oui le champ est modifiable ;Hello, nous avons bien le champ “Communication Language” qui est alimenté en fonction du site de navigation du client. 

Exemple: Lucy s’est connectée sur le site Européen en anglais, sa “Communication Language” est donc “English”

[https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/001Aa00000VlpAyIAJ/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/001Aa00000VlpAyIAJ/view|smart-link]

Après si il fait un ticket au service client celui-ci à la main pour modifier

Merci

Johanna

Hi [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

The issue is because in the promotion there was configured variation group as a bonus product which is not actual sellable product. 
Only sellable products could be added as a bonus product which will be automatically added to the cart.

Description:
On all forms (account creation, delivery address, billing, etc.), when we make an error in a field, and we click on the action button, we don't really understand that there's an error.

On mobile, we stay on the button, and it's not grayed out. We get the impression that the button isn't working.
It's when I go back up to the form that I realize there's an error.


I'm aware that no such request has been made. But I create a ticket to see how much work it takes.
is it possible, when there's an error in a form, to redigitize the screen to the error after pressing the button?


Thanks in advance,
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI

Clément;Hi, you can hide a content asset for a specific site through the following steps:

#  Go to BM.
# Select the site to which you want to turn the Asset off.
# Go to Merchant tools > Content Assets and select the Asset you want to hide (the current asset ID is “Cart-Separate-packages“).
# In the Asset settings page, from the site dropdown, select the current site. You will only see the site you have selected on step 2.
!image-20240412-122403.png|width=598,height=124,alt="image-20240412-122403.png"!
# There you switch off the “Use Default“ and select the value to be “No“
!image-20240412-122552.png|width=646,height=135,alt="image-20240412-122552.png"!

I’ve done it now and please keep in mind that selecting “No”, while being to the “Default” option will turn off the asset for all of the sites.

Best regards,
Kamen 🙂

Summary: C&C order and return feasibility to block
Description:
Nous avons identifié qu’il est possible sur le front de retourner une commande click and collect qui n’a pas été retirée en boutique.

Numéro de commande : US24000950-FO1 

la réponse de Y2 dans le MWA est conforme : [https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000013SjxIAE/view|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/MDW_Action__c/a0xAa0000013SjxIAE/view]

vu avec [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

cc [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203]
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
On the Storefront, I confirmed it’s not possible to create a return for a customer who didn’t retrieve the goods.
Blocking the Return to Warehouse would be only needed for the Customer Service.
It was decide previously not to block the Customer Service so they can override any blocker but as this wouldn’t be well distributed to CEGID and the ERP, we will block only this specific case: an Order summary which Shipping Method is “CNC” can’t be return with the screen flow (Customer Service);[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] On the Storefront, I confirmed it’s not possible to create a return for a customer who didn’t retrieve the goods.
Blocking the Return to Warehouse would be only needed for the Customer Service.
It was decide previously not to block the Customer Service so they can override any blocker but as this wouldn’t be well distributed to CEGID and the ERP, we will block only this specific case: an Order summary which Shipping Method is “CNC” can’t be return with the screen flow (Customer Service)

So should this rule be changed [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ?;This question / open point can be closed [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f]

[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

Depuis ton retour, il faut aller dans les produits associés (onglet Related)

Si ce n’est pas assez clair on peut faire un call de 5 min

Description:
Hello,
We have a real contribution topic for the design team.
The aim of having Salesforce is to use a common template, and to have English automatically on all three sites.
We have two big topics in this area:

* Default and French automation.
What was planned: The Default language would display English on all 3 sites.
Default is also displayed on French, if French is not contributed.
If French is contributed, it overrides English.
-> it doesn't work.

Another problem:
On Page designer, Mélanie contributes French and English, and blocks from both versions appear on the same page. This breaks the front end.

Description:
We have an issue with the pictures on our products pages.

The problem is that we have two teams that are both doing the pictures for our products. We end up with the same images twice on the product page. The concern is that the quality of the pictures is really different and we cannot keep the flat pictures made by Asia on our website. The photos have almost the same name, and Akeneo does not crush the image if another image has the same name.

I think that we must make sure that CMC images are priority on our product sheets (UK, US, EU), and make sure we don’t receive the picture made by the Asia if we already have the picture made by CMC.


Is there a rule in the connector that allows you to meet this request?
Akeneo tell us it's not possible.

Attention: we still need images of Asia for some occasions, because it is Asia that shoots travel products for us.

We can't launch a site with the current photos.

thanks for your help

cc [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] , [~accountid:712020:e4b1aecd-3571-4409-881f-7e59ca984d62] , [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] 

!image (15) (1).png|width=100%,alt="image (15) (1).png"!



!image (14) (1).png|width=100%,alt="image (14) (1).png"!



!image (13) (1).png|width=100%,alt="image (13) (1).png"!
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
BBD should customize the connector in order to change the order of the images.

[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:5efe11d06fddfb0bb40896c1] ;[~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] , you think it’s possible to do that for the launch US ?

thanks;Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

On the screenshots you can notice that CMC images are coming first. The code is implemented and deployed on Staging.

!Screenshot_130-20240415-105144.png|width=695,height=345,alt="Screenshot_130-20240415-105144.png"!

!Screenshot_128-20240415-104803.png|width=689,height=506,alt="Screenshot_128-20240415-104803.png"!


During the development, I noticed few things:
- for some products there are 2 flat images with {xxxx}_1.jpg - 1 from CMC directory and 1 from JP / TW. Should we keep the both {xxxx}_1.jpg images
- With this change you need to be sure that there will be a CMC flat image for all products otherwise {xxxx}_1.jpg will be not first image because CMC images are with priority and if there is no CMC image it will take next CMC image available.
- For products without a single CMC image, it will be sorted numeric - {xxxx}_1.jpg, {xxxx}_10.jps and so on

[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] I need your attention on the last 3 points.


Note: it will be visible on the site after next run of the job. In the afternoon.

Best,
Petar

Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
J’ai l’impression qu’il y a un problème de process car sur les produits il n’y a aucune quantité retournée et le remboursement n’a pas été effectué.

[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203]  As tu traité ton retour depuis Bayretail ou depuis l’OMS ?

Pour traiter un retour depuis l’OMS il faut : 

* Mettre à jour les quantités reçues pour chaque produit
* Mettre à jour le Return Order à “Received”
* Aller dans le module de gestion des remboursements et valider le remboursement
* Un MDW action est alors automatiquement créé
* Le retour passé au statut complete automatiquement dans les 24h si Adyen confirme le remboursement;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

Le retour est effectué dans l’OMS
Je confirme que l'étape du remboursement n’a pas été effectuée

Summary: Price adjusment not sent to OMS
Description:
When I place an order with a discounted product (such as [https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/women/clothing/jackets-and-coats/black-new-cruella-coat-MB78U092_000.html|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/women/clothing/jackets-and-coats/black-new-cruella-coat-MB78U092_000.html])

Then the discount is not visible in OMS ([https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/OrderSummary/1OsAa0000002wxZKAQ/view)|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/OrderSummary/1OsAa0000002wxZKAQ/view)]



We are expecting to see the discount in the adjustments. It works fine for the free delivery
Creator: Tim Froger
Comment:
[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] I don’t know who is able to solve this issue on SFCC side;The issue comes from the fact that on SFCC, when the promotion is applied by a Pricebook direclty, it’s not seen as an Promotion but only new price to apply.
I’m changing configuration to use a Promotion that will be linked to the SalesPricebook.
It worked on one Order: [https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/OrderItemSummary/10uAa000001D6lOIAS/view?ws=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FOrderSummary%2F1OsAa0000002zgvKAA%2Fview|https://agnesb--recette.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/OrderItemSummary/10uAa000001D6lOIAS/view?ws=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FOrderSummary%2F1OsAa0000002zgvKAA%2Fview]

Now, I need to apply this change on the 3 sites with the 3 currencies.

Summary: Discount reason to send in Y2
Description:
Pour une commande avec une ligne avec un article remisé, le motif de remise ne descend pas dans Y2.

Tim a informé Lionel que la donnée n’existe pas dans l’OMS ce qui est une anomalie.
Creator: Sabine Solère
Comment:
[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] Ce problème est lié à un problème avec le champ standard GrossUnitPrice qui est arrondi (ce qui créé une fausse remise côté CEGID). Pour pallier ce problème, nous avons créer un champ custom GrossUnitPrice qui n’est pas arrondi.

Azzedine a adapté Talend, il faut désormais tester

Description:
Problem with the "SKU" in the product description. The SKU adapts to the size. If we click on a size, or if we change, the SKU also changes.
This "SKU" in the description should be a fixed value, linked to the color reference (e.g. L841TN45_6060).

Thanks;Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

The resource tab is not related to *Lengow*.

*Locking System Resources during Job Execution*
When you create a job, you can prevent system resources from being modified by another job while your job is executing. To know which system resources to assign to the job, you must know which resources are related to which entity. For example, if your job modifies customers, assign the system resource profile to your job because customers are related to the profile system resource. When your job is executing, another job can't modify the profile system resource and unexpectedly change the outcome of your job. Resource locks are re-entrant locks. In other words, if a job locks a resource, job steps in that job can lock the same resource again.

_Marketplaces expect a crossed-out price next to the discounted price._
_Can I send the base price in an attribute?_
_And keep the sale_price with an "up-to-date" value._

*Lengow cartridge out of the box supports* +*only 1 price - sale price.*+
It’s extendable. [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] 

_Do we have a job that only updates stock frequently?_
_If not, I'll program the feed to update several times an hour, but that can be pretty cumbersome?_

The feed is the *single* source of information for the marketplaces. This is the reason that it contains inventory, prices and so on. 
Therefore the only way to update the information from the feed is basically to update the feed => generate new feed. ( The job is running for about 2 mins per site).

+Moreover, we don’t need to create a job for stock level, because this job should generate new feed, which means it is the same job as the current one.+

Description:
The FR (EU) and EN (EU) locales are two languages of the same site, translations of the same content.

When we navigate, and change locales between the two, we must stay on the same page.

Today, if we change the locale, we arrive on the home page.
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] 

As part of this project, we know it’s the same site and different languages. Customers don’t, and it looks like a separate site on the country selector and customers are used to be redirected to homepage once we change the the locale. We have took time with dev team to check and benchmark on so many different customer cases (among them our clients) and they have the same behavior. 

The requirement you are asking for is clear, but presents some technical complexity since we don’t have the same names of the categories and same URLS ( english vs french) dev team is raising high potential risks of introducing bugs or errors into the system.

Summary: Ligne de livraison qui descend seule dans Y2
Description:
Ici nous avons un ticket Y2 avec seulement la ligne de livraison : 

Commande US24000889

!image-20240403-191803.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240403-191803.png"!

Nous ne comprenons pas la raison, mais ça ne doit pas arriver.

* Soit la commande est annulée car tous les produits sont annulés, alors aucun ticket ne doit être créé.
* Soit l’un des produits est annulé, mais la commande doit être finalisée avant de créer un ticket. Dans cette commande sur SF, la commande est en cours de préparation. 1 ticket a été créé alors que deux autres ordres de préparations sont en attentes de préparation.
Autre point bloquant, nous sommes sur les US, nous ne pouvons pas avoir plusieurs ordres de préparations.

[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] , nous devons creuser cette commande.

Merci,

Clément
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] Je n’arrive pas à comprendre ce qui a été fait sur cet ordre de préparation. T’en rappelles tu ?



Envoi de l’information à Y2 → Cela est arrivé car le Fulfillment Order a été passé à Fulfilled. J’ai corrigé pour ne plus en envoyer si aucun produit

Nous avons plusieurs ordres de préparations pour potentiellement 2 raisons : annulation manuelle ou bounce. Souhaitez vous désactiver le bounce pour les US ? Je pense que la réponse dépendra des ouvertures de boutique prévues aux US;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

La commande était composé de 3 quantités sur cette référence L856U092_000

J’ai modifié la quantité à 2 dans l’ordre de préparation

Puis j’ai rejeté les 2 quantités restantes, toujours dans l’ordre de préparation

Nous ne voulons pas de Bounce sur les US

Merci;[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

J’ai désactivé le bounce pour US + dès lors qu’un article est rejeté il est annulé pour US

Description:
Bonjour

Lorsque que l’on passe une commande en “rejected” dans L’OMS, il n’est plus possible de modifier le statut. 
En front la commande reste en statut “in process”. 

Est ce un bug ou bien y a t-il moyen de modifier le statut de la commande en annulée ? 

J’ai aussi essayer d’annuler la commande via le résumé de commande mais j’ai eu un message d’erreur. ( cf screen 3)

Merci pour votre retour

!image-20240403-154753.png|width=1857,height=838,alt="image-20240403-154753.png"!

!image-20240403-154822.png|width=976,height=925,alt="image-20240403-154822.png"!

screen 3

!image-20240403-155036.png|width=1882,height=540,alt="image-20240403-155036.png"!
Creator: Hannah Moise
Comment:
[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

Lorsqu’un ordre de préparation à “Rejected” en effet il n’est plus possible de modifier son statut.

Sur le front, le statut est bon car la commande n’est pas annulée (seulement un ordre de préparation)

En revanche, il doit être possible de passer la commande à Annuler → J’ai apporté un correctif, peux tu retester ?;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] Le correctif fonctionne, j’ai pu rejeter et ensuite annuler la commande *US24000899*

Merci

Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330], just to clarify how Apple Pay via Adyen works:

Adyen creates an Apple Pay account for us, and we don’t have access to it.

For testing, you can use any developer apple pay account to create a test user, following the instructions here [https://developer.apple.com/apple-pay/sandbox-testing/|https://developer.apple.com/apple-pay/sandbox-testing/|smart-link] 

If you don’t have an apple pay developer account, I can create a tester account for you from my personal apple developer account, but ideally you should have one just to be able to test in the future as well.

Description:
Bonjour,

Nous nous apercevons que les paiements EU/UK/US arrivent dans le même espace "agnesb-Ecom".

Aujourd'hui, nous avons 3 comptes : 

* Agnesb-ECOM  : EU

* Agnesb-US

* Agnesb-UK

Nous souhaitons conserver la même organisation, afin de faire des rapprochements correctement.

Pouvez-vous nous expliquer ce choix de mettre dans agnesb-ECOM ?

Est-ce que ce changement peut être opéré rapidement? 

Merci d'avance,
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]

Currently on the testing Adyen account there is only 1 option - Agnesb-ECOM.

This is the reason we use only it.



!Screenshot_110.png|width=1414,height=773,alt="Screenshot_110.png"!


For your *production environment*, we will setup *Adyen Live Accounts* and it should work as expected. 

For the production account we will need more details:

* *Adyen Client Key*
* *Merchant Account (u already provided it in the above description)*
* *API key of webservice*
* *Webhook username*
* *Webhook password*
* *HMAC Key (Optional)*

I suggest scheduling a meeting and setup it together for production.;Hello [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] ,

I open already access at agnesb.US and [agnesb.Uk|http://agnesb.Uk] at [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] . 

Do you need some access too ?

Ok for a meeting for production.

I sent you an invitation.

Thanks;What was the conclusion of the call [~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] & [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] ;I finalized the configuration this morning and the checks are good.
Now we have the 3 merchant accounts that works End to End with OMS.

Summary: Webservice UPS for US to Canada
Description: Because when trying to ship from US to Canada the shipping label fails and we are not able to print the related UPS sticker, could you send us a query that works for sticker generation please ?
Creator: Sarah Margoses
Comment:
Bonjour @Clément ALBERTINI,

Aujourd'hui, nous générons des étiquettes pour les expéditions de US → US. Pour générer des étiquettes d'expédition pour les envois de US → Canada, il semble que nous devions utiliser une requête API différente. J'ai consulté la documentation UPS sur ce lien : UPS API Status | UPS - États-Unis pour mettre en œuvre ma demande, mais j'ai reçu une erreur du service avec le code d'erreur 120374 :

"message" : "Le compte UPS n'est pas autorisé pour le service Worldwide Economy DDU."

Je vous joins la requête que j'ai effectuée en me basant sur la documentation.

J'ai essayé de contacter le service, et j'ai reçu cette réponse :

 _"Apologies for the delay in response as we are currently working through a backlog of cases._ 

 _If not having the appropriate contract applied to your UPS account. If not already, your UPS account representative will need to assist on the topic - once the contract is enabled on your account, this error should resolve itself"_

Pourriez-vous vérifier :

* Si le compte a les autorisations nécessaires pour effectuer une requête API de US → Canada. 
* Exemple de requête type pour générer le label
* Devons nous générer étiquette + invoice + déclaration de douane? ou d’autre document.

Merci d’avance;Merci [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] , je prends le point.

Clément;Hello [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] ,

Je t’ai mis dans une boucle avec Mimi des US, et son contact UPS, pour régler le soucis rapidement.

Ils ont besoin du message d’erreur.

Merci d’avance,

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] ;[~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] c’est fait merci.;[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] Salut!
Je génère aujourd’hui l’étiquette en local pour US vers Canada (2 pdf [^77490a56-9e0d-47b5-b3c9-5f3f25dd0cfa]  [^491f0a02-7216-4b05-8b1e-ceb1015b52e5] ).
Il faut que j’implémente mon apex class et le custom metadata afin de déployer sur recette.

Je lis sur la description du ticket: “ship from US to Canada the shipping label”.
On a pas besoin de l’étiquette retour: Canada to US?;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] [~accountid:712020:67bc37f4-2782-4509-aca8-e1cc94082a06] tu me confirmes que cela est terminé et livré en recette ?

Il faudra déployer ensuite en prod. La classe de tests est à jour ?;[~accountid:712020:7706d014-e4ed-4bce-8d30-09ef64c878d6] Oui c’est livré en recette

La classe de test est en cours

Description:
Today, it's impossible to test click and collect (EU/ US/ UK), and e-resa.
Stocks are not good. Stores are not displayed, either from store availability or from checkout.
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI

Description:
After checking several products, the stocks are wrong.

However, [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] confirms that Y2 does indeed send updated stock flows, with movements.

Here are some SKUs with fake stock:

* *Y768TV20_686-2*

Y2 (Madison) : 

!image-20240402-155453.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240402-155453.png"!

OCI (Madison) : 

!image-20240402-155607.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240402-155607.png"!



* *Y759RIS0_639-3*

Y2 : 

!image-20240402-160107.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240402-160107.png"!

OCI : 

!image-20240402-160754.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240402-160754.png"!

Can you export a stock file to check all the differences?
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Le problème a été analysé ce matin et nous savons maintenant que le souci vient du fait que les stocks nuls ou négatifs ne sont pas poussés par CEGID vers l’OCI. Il s’agirait bien des produits qui avaient été modifié pour la démo mais il est intéressant de noter que l’OCI aurait dû être écrasé par les données CEGID le lendemain de la démo et cela n’a pas été le cas du fait du problème ci-dessus.

La modification de la requête CEGID est en cours pour donner toutes les lignes à 0 pour le traitement FULL OCI.;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] l’anomalie sur le CAB 3540697951171 (fourni par Lionel) est liée à un stock qui a été créé sur l’OCI et non depuis Y2. En effet, la fiche stock n’existait pas dans Y2 avant que je créé une entrée exceptionnelle sur ce CAB. Cela veut dire que le croisement CAB/ dépôt ne sera pas envoyé à zéro tant que la fiche stock du sku n’existera pas dans Y2. Est-ce que c’est un sujet?

cc [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330]  ;Non, cela n’a aucune raison d’arriver selon moi. Je vais passer à 0 tous ces stocks pour éviter de perturber les tests.
Par ailleurs, je trouve positif et rassurant que CEGID pousse désormais tous les stocks nul ou négatif à 0 dans le cas nominal.;[~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] pouvons-nous faire un contrôle demain matin à 9h en réunion avec check global et par zone des quantités?;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] comme convenu, pour procéder à une vérification exhaustive des stocks, nous pouvons extraire ces données de l’OCI en masse.

Ici, une vision exhaustive des stocks OCI : 

* Onglet *LocationGroupEur* => somme des stocks boutique et entrepot pour l’Europe
* Onglet *detail par Location* => extraction explicite des locations suivants avec les quantités par SKU ({{"U02","G09","G04","F89","F88","F87","F78","F72","F58","F57","F56","F55","F49","F48","F46","F44","F43","F42","F01A","F40","F39","F30","F27","F24","F22","F17","F13","F11","F04"}})
* Onglet *SKU-EAN*: extraction des Product2 du CRM pour faire la transco SKU → EAN (permet aussi de tester que l’absence d’un produit dans le CRM est normal en cas de non matching)

 

[^20240411_OCI Export.xlsx]

;Afin d’identifier d'éventuel écart, j’ai extrait le stock du 12/04 à 9h en utilisant l’export Full afin de le rapprocher du fichier extrait par [~accountid:5e1edde7ee2e8f0ca83a381f] le 11/04 à 19h34.

Il existe quelques écarts non expliqués. sur les 10 lignes : 4 ne sont pas présents dans l’OCI,  



!image-20240412-081948.png|width=1721,height=302,alt="image-20240412-081948.png"!;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] 

Je peux voir les lignes que tu as identifiées

!image-20240412-091820.png|width=1682,height=372,alt="image-20240412-091820.png"!;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] je pense que LIonel ne me les a pas transmises dans son fichiers ou alors c’est un pb de mapping avec le code barre;Comme déjà évoqué, il y avait bien un problème de mapping côté demi interface CEGID → Talend. Ce ticket peut-il être fermé ?

Summary: Décimale non prix en compte dans les flux vers Y2
Description:
Certains prix avec des décimales sont arrondies par SFCC lors de l’envoie des tickets vers Y2.

Ce qui génère des prix remisés sur la commande dans Y2, et créé des écarts de prix.

→ ex : *US24000879 (FO1)*

Sujet prix en charge par [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

cc [~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc]
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
Nous avons remarqué que le champ GrossUnitPrice est parfois arrondi par Salesforce. Le support nous a confirmé cette hypothèse, nous avons donc créé un champ custom pour pallier ce problème (GrossUnitPrice__c).

Azzedine doit mettre à jour Talend;Si [~accountid:6425456d4b23217e558e9578] a mis à jour le champ dans talend, pouvons-nous prévoir une cession de test [~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] lundi 8 avril?;[~accountid:63c130d756176e219bed49bc] Ce ticket a été validé hier. Tu confirmes ?

Je  viens de modifier le titre du ticket, 

Le problème concerne l’affichage en front, lorsque le client sélectionne la livraison en point relais, le prix/gratuité de la livraison doit se mettre à jour dans le *“Récapitulatif de commande”* dés l'étape *“1. Information de livraison”*. 

!image-20240402-123745.png|width=941,height=766,alt="image-20240402-123745.png"!



Lorsque les frais de livraison en point relais sont payant, le tarif livraison en point relais ne se mets pas à jour à l'étape *1. “Information de livraison”* dans *“Récapitulatif de commande”*, seulement à l'étape *“2. Paiment”*. 

Pouvez-vous modifier ceci et faire en sorte que les tarifs de livraison se mette à jour à l'étape 1 ?

!image-20240402-124146.png|width=803,height=732,alt="image-20240402-124146.png"!

Merci;Après plusieurs test de parcours utilisateur, je suis repassée depuis la livraison point relais gratuite à la livraison payante à domicile tout en restant à l'étape “1. Information de livraison”. 

Le problème que nous avons pour passer du tarif de la livraison domicile au tarif de la livraison point relais n’existe pas pour passer du tarif point relais au tarif livraison à domicile à l'étape 1, les frais de 9 € se mette bien à jour dans le récapitulatif de commande, sans passer par l'étape 2. paiement.

Merci

!image-20240402-125702.png|width=1035,height=633,alt="image-20240402-125702.png"!



!image-20240402-125721.png|width=845,height=858,alt="image-20240402-125721.png"!;I tested the Relay delivery for a product over 180€ and the free shipping appear in the order summary from the choice of delivery method. Ok for me, thank you

[^checkout promotion.webm];Hi [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330], the Avalara cartrides, which are necessary for tax calculations on US, were not activated for some time, and this led to some issues in the checkout for US - for example you can see in your video initially the Grand Total is missing, so the bugs were most likely related to that.

We added the cartridges, so you can retest.

Apart from that, these changes we’ve made are just visual, for updating the amounts displayed in cart/minicart - the actual calculation of promotions and prices is still done by core SFCC code, so even if there are some visual bugs in the cart, the actual amounts should normally be updated when the user proceeds to the checkout.

cc [~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] [~accountid:60f91d9d2b56cc0069832a09] ;[~accountid:712020:ebac7c57-90f8-4784-aa37-cd3463dd2d3b] ,

My video concerning the basket and order summary.

If you look, i have a “Saving”.

When i click on “Edit” on product, and “Save changes”, the order summary change and my Saving is delete.

This is really bad because customers can end up canceling their checkout thinking that the promotion is no longer valid.
I didn't change anything in my basket, I just pressed buttons.
What's more, it's a classic use case, because a customer can hesitate over a size, click on "edit", then come back without changing anything.

Please and retest and let me know if it happens again.

Summary: Request to Disable Click Functionality on Level 1 & 2 Menu Categories
Description:
Currently, the Level 1 and Level 2 categories in our navigation menu are clickable, leading users to a landing page when selected.

!image-20240327-164736.png|width=83.33333333333334%,alt="image-20240327-164736.png"!



Agnes b would like to change this functionality so that these category levels *are no longe*r *clickable,* serving instead as simple headers to structure the menu more intuitively and guide users towards more specific content at lower menu levels.

Required Changes:

# Disable the click functionality for all Level 1 category names in the menu. These should act as main headers without redirecting the user to a different page when clicked.
# Apply the same change to the Level 2 category names, ensuring they are not clickable and do not lead users to another page.
# Ensure that sub-categories beneath Level 2 (Level 3 and beyond, where applicable) remain clickable and function as they currently do, directing users to the relevant pages.
# After implementing these changes, please ensure that the menu still appears visually consistent and user-friendly, with clear indications that Level 1 and 2 categories are non-clickable.
Creator: Fatima-Ezzahra Amalou
Comment:

this can be tested on staging. 

# Level 1 & 2 are no clickable

Same thing is not to be applied on first level since an action is awaited from the hover on the category to show the dropdown bellow with the other sub-categories. ;[~accountid:5efe11d06fddfb0bb40896c1] ,

OK for me.

Thanks !

Summary: Remove France -English Locale from Local Switcher
Description:
Currently, the local switcher includes the France locale along with Europe, offering French and English languages. However, it has been decided to streamline the options and remove the France english locale from the local switcher.

*Action Required:*

* Remove the France -English locale option from the local switcher.
* Retain only the Europe option with *English languages.*
* Ensure that the local switcher is updated across all relevant pages and modules where it appears.

*Reasoning:*

* Simplifying the local switcher by removing the France english locale aligns with our current user preferences
* By keeping only the Europe option, we maintain language option english, catering to our diverse user base across Europe.
* Please ensure that the change is thoroughly tested across different environments to prevent any unexpected issues.
Creator: Fatima-Ezzahra Amalou

Summary: Implementing Catalog-Level Promotions from the PIM
Description:
The goal is to implement a feature that allows the application of promotions directly at the catalog level, enabling the display of both the original and discounted prices. Additionally, product tags, which are managed within the Product Information Management system, should be displayed alongside the prices to provide customers with more information and context regarding the promotion.

# *Catalog-Level Promotion Application:*
#* Implement functionality to apply promotions directly to products at the catalog level.
#* Ensure that the promotion logic supports various types of discounts, such as percentage-based or fixed amount off.
# *Price Display:*
#* The product listings should clearly display the original price, crossed out, alongside the discounted price to highlight the offer.
#* Ensure that the price display is updated in real-time to reflect any changes in the promotion or product pricing.

The tag should come from the field : *sale_discount*
Creator: Fatima-Ezzahra Amalou

Summary: Enhancements for Text Alignment and Attribute Adjustability in Page Designer
Description:
*Objective:*
To introduce enhanced features in Page Designer that allow users to have greater control over t*ext alignment, attribute adjustability, color changes, heading modifications, and adjustments to markup, margin, and padding.*

*Details:*

# *General Component Enhancements:* {color:#bf2600}*(PRIO 0)* {color}
#* Remove all mandatory logic on fields across all components, allowing users more flexibility in data input and presentation.
#* Dissociate the breadcrumb component from the static layout, enabling dynamic rendering based on the page ID.
# *Text Alignment:*
#* Integrate text alignment options (left, right, center, justify) within the textbox asset in Page Designer.
#* Ensure alignment changes are responsive 
# *Heading Modification:*
#* Facilitate easy modifications to heading styles for all text fields.
# *Markup, Margin, and Padding Adjustments:*
#* Offer tools to fine-tune markup around text elements, aiding in superior content organization.
#* Allow for the customization of margins and paddings around text blocks to give users precise control over layout and spacing.





Here is customer feedback: 

!image-20240327-132529.png|width=25%,alt="image-20240327-132529.png"!



















Depending on the components, if there are associated textboxes, the text will not have the same template. You can see the example right below. The two red frames seemingly have paragraphs, but the font sizes are different.

Some headings are not responsive on mobile (see the yellow frame in the example).













!image-20240327-132633.png|width=25%,alt="image-20240327-132633.png"!

In terms of layout, when using column assets, texts are aligned to the left or centered randomly. However, we have no alignment management options within the "textbox" asset.

































!image-20240327-132726.png|width=50%,alt="image-20240327-132726.png"!





We can't control the spacing. Would it be possible to have a "divider" type component?













+ Page titles cannot be formatted as H1.
Creator: Fatima-Ezzahra Amalou
Comment:
[~accountid:6093e700cc7830006a70da67] this should be reviewed and pushed in prio please.

Summary: Implementation of "View All" Feature Across Various Storefronts and Categories
Description:
Customer request to add "View All" feature for several storefronts and categories to enhance our user experience by allowing customers to view all products within a category at once. 

# Women's Section:
#* Clothing: Add "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
#* Accessories: Implement "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
#* Shoes: Enable "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
# Men's Section:
#* Clothing: Add "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
#* Accessories: Implement "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
#* Shoes: Enable "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
# Children's Section:
#* Girls: Add "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US (Note: This category is mentioned twice, please clarify if this is intentional or a duplication).
#* Boys: Implement "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
#* Layette: Enable "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
# Bags Section:
#* Women's Leather Goods: Add "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.
#* Men's Leather Goods: Implement "View All" for Storefront_Catalog_EU, Storefront_Catalog_UK, Storefront_Catalog_US.

In addition of the logic we have to have the “view all” only if we have more than 12 subcategories, we need to have it on all categories on the menu since the first level and second level will no longer will be clickable.
Creator: Fatima-Ezzahra Amalou
Comment:
Hello [~accountid:621e3e27f1e55c0070ee0330] [~accountid:62c3f60ee16ddfe82bdf5832] 

This can be tested and also keep in moind that we have made it configurable, we created the option in Categories to be able to Enable/Disable the “View All” button. To access the custom attribute, go to BM>Catalogs>Categories>Edit Category>Category Attributes> In the Menu section there is an attribute with ID: “showViewAllButton“. Please keep in mind that this should be *ONLY* enabled on Level 2 categories. You can enable it on other ones but it won’t have any effect.

Comment:
[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] Ta capture d'écran a été prise sur l’objet Commande.
Ce n’est pas sur cet objet que se trouve les ordre de préparation, il faut se rendre sur Résumé de commande.



Attention, il faut bien sélectionner la vue de liste “Toutes les commandes“

!image-20240327-144656.png|width=1704,height=542,alt="image-20240327-144656.png"!

Certains n° de commande commencent par DEV lorsque nous passons des commandes sur les environnements de DEV. Cela permet de faire la distinction.



L’id de commande 06063159 est un numéro générer par Salesforce (il ajoute +1 à chaque commande);[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] 

J’ai bien chercher à créer des ordres de préparations dans la section résumé de commande. 

Si j’ai envoyé le screen depuis la section commande c’était pour te montrer la liste des commande que je n’arrive pas à traiter. 

!image-20240327-150339.png|width=1266,height=491,alt="image-20240327-150339.png"!;[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] 

La recherche ne fonctionne pas car le champ Account est un lien vers le compte (et non un texte).

Pour trouver tes résumés de commande, tu peux te créer une vue de liste personnalisée et ajouter les filtres que tu souhaites. Voici un exemple : 

!image-20240327-151241.png|width=1705,height=451,alt="image-20240327-151241.png"!;[~accountid:6040e437333ff40070ed2203] tu as créé une commande à partir de quel compte depuis le site marchand ?;[~accountid:604a09d0d7f56e0071b0e1d0] Merci
[~accountid:61703a01860f78006bc5d56f] Depuis le compte Hannah Moïse avec mon adresse mail agnes b.

Description:
When we're on the US site, the Madison boutique doesn't appear, the FR boutiques do, as well as the corners.
-> if the product is present on the US site, it means that it is stocked in Madison.
-> we want to display available stock only in local boutiques.
-> we don't manage corner stock

In France, the dynamic display of boutiques must respect both geolocation and stock.
Today, we have several boutiques where the item is unavailable, then below, a stocked boutique
-> either display only stocked stores
-> or display in the right order, first stocked and nearest, then non-stocked.
Creator: Clément ALBERTINI
Comment:
* Results

When I'm on a product sheet on the US site, I can see by geolocating myself the availability of products in France and the UK.
We only need to see the availability linked to its locality.
US -> US store
UK -> UK store
FR and EU -> FR store

!image-20240404-154247.png|width=100%,alt="image-20240404-154247.png"!

* Text 

If I select a city, I get the name displayed in "your result for "Paris, France" : 

!image-20240404-154346.png|width=66.67%,alt="image-20240404-154346.png"!

But if I geolocate, I get nothing in the text.
Can I adapt the result to my geolocation?
Or put "My position".

!image-20240404-154447.png|width=66.67%,alt="image-20240404-154447.png"!

Description:
When we change color on a product detail page, we should arrive on a new page, with :

* a new URL
* a new breadcrumb trail
* a new title
* the description with the correct reference.

Today, if I'm on this product :
[https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/women_us/women_clothing_us/women_clothing_tshirts_tank_tops_us/grey-%22agn%C3%A8s-b.%22-brando-t-shirt-2653S137_890.html?dwvar_2653S137__890_color=890&quantity=1|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/women_us/women_clothing_us/women_clothing_tshirts_tank_tops_us/grey-%22agn%C3%A8s-b.%22-brando-t-shirt-2653S137_890.html?dwvar_2653S137__890_color=890&quantity=1]

Description:
Specify directives for each type of page (INDEX, FOLLOW; NOINDEX, FOLLOW, etc).

For the URL [https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/men_us/men_shoes_us/men_shoes_sneakers_us/|https://staging.agnesb.com/en-us/men_us/men_shoes_us/men_shoes_sneakers_us/] and currently, all URLs on the site should have the directive INDEX, FOLLOW.

A page that we do not want to index but still want to allow exploration will have the directive: NOINDEX, FOLLOW.

And for a page that we do not want to index and do not want to be explored will have the directive: NOINDEX, NOFOLLOW.
Creator: Margaux Zermati
Margaux Zermati
